Pinki is 26 years old and her husband is 29 years old. Pinki is literate up to grade 4 and able to sign her name. Pinki is a housewife and her husband is a farmer. They have three children and two of them receive an education. 

From the beginning, both Pinki and her husband have faced lots of problems in covering the family expenses, but still they have not lost their hope to survive. The income from their farming business is not too good. Due to a lack of capital, they couldn’t buy a variety of seeds for cultivation. They have taken a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to buy eggplant seeds and the necessary agricultural supplies so that they can cultivate eggplant and earn money.

They hope that someday they will overcome all the odd situations and will be able to live a healthy life with the profit from her business.

She is highly obliged to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and necessary agricultural supplies for eggplant cultivation.

loans.name: Ana Veraliz

texts.es: Ana de 49 años de edad, no estudio, esta soltera, su esposo viajo para estados unidos, no sabe nada de él. Sus hijos estudian. Ana trabaja como comerciante en el mercado de la ciudad,  que queda a 30 minutos de su cantón, trabaja en eso desde hace 10 años. Necesita el crédito para invertirlo en agricultura,  comprar fertilizantes para la siembra de maíz y una parte para arreglar el techo de su casa. Sueña poder construir su casa mejor para que su familia tenga una casa segura.
texts.en: Ana, 49, did not study, and is single. Her husband traveled to the United States, she knows nothing of him. Her children study. Ana works as a merchant in the city market, which is 30 minutes from her rural community. She has been working in this for 10 years. She needs the loan to invest it in agriculture, buy fertilizers for growing corn and part of it to fix the roof of her house. She dreams of being able to construct her house better so that her family has a secure house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for growing corn and to fix the roof on her house.

loans.name: Cruz Elena

texts.es:
La señora Cruz es una mujer muy emprendedora y trabajadora, cuenta con varios locales los cuales arrienda a otros microempresarios para que pongan sus negocios allí.
Inicio con esta actividad al verse obligada a llevar las responsabilidades del hogar a causa del fallecimiento de su esposo, es decir que se convertido en la cabeza del hogar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para realizar mejoras locativas a uno de sus locales en el cual planea abrir una cafetería para que sus hijos laboren allí y obtengan sus propios ingresos estables.
Su mayor sueño es poder acreditar el negocio, hacerlo duradero en el tiempo, autosostenible y más amplio.
Es una mujer con gran capacidad para hacer negocios y trabajar, quiere que esta habilidad la adopten sus hijos para que puedan progresar en la vida.
texts.en:
Cruz is a very enterprising and hardworking woman. She has various business locales, which she rents to other microenterprise owners so that they can put their businesses there. She started this activity upon seeing herself obliged to carrying out the responsibilities of the home, due to the death of her husband. In other words, she converted into the head of household.

She is applying for a loan to carry out localized renovations to one of her properties, in which she plans to open a café so that her children work there and earn their own stable income.

Her greatest dream is to be able to give credit to the business, make it durable over time, self-sustainable and larger. She is a woman with great capacity for doing business and working. She wants her children to adopt this ability so that they can progress in life.

loans.use: to make localized renovations to one of her properties.

loans.name: Pramita

texts.en:
Pramita is 23 years old and her husband is 29 years old. Both Pramita and her husband have passed class VI (grade 6). Pramita is the mother of two children and both of them are too young to go to school. 

Pramita is a housewife and her husband is a farmer. Her husband cultivates different crops in their field but the income is not enough. So they decided to take a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to cultivate other different crops in the field. They will use the loan for buying eggplant seeds and fertilizers 

According to them, eggplant cultivation is a profitable business in their area and from this, she can uplift her financial status and give her children a better education for establishing them in their life.

They are thankful to BJS and Kiva for the loan support.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers for eggplant cultivation

loans.name: Renuka

texts.en:
Renuka is a 34-year-old woman from the small village of ‘Maynaguri’ who lives with her husband Bablu and four children in a small hut. Renuka is a hardworking housewife.

She and her husband have their own land where they cultivate different vegetables in different seasons and sell those vegetables in the market.

Renuka helps her husband in the field after managing her household work. Now they have decided to grow eggplant. Thus, she has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase fertilizer and seeds. She wants to extend her farming business. She wants to buy more land with the profit from her business.

Renuka is thankful to BJS and Kiva for their financial support.

loans.use: To purchase eggplant seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Shantana

texts.en:
Shantana is a 43-year-old married woman. She is illiterate and just knows how to sign her name. Her poverty has not allowed her to receive an education. Now Shantana is a mother of three children, two of whom are in higher classes (in grade 9 and 10) and one has completed a BA (Bachelor of Arts). 

She has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) for purchasing a cow so that she can sell milk and milk products in her locality. Her husband is a farmer. Both Shantana and her husband work together and divide their work. They work long hours so that they can give a good education and bright future to their children. This loan will give them an opportunity to make their dreams come true.

Now Shantana lives in a Kaccha house (made of straw and mud), but with the profit, they hope to build a concrete house. She hopes that she will earn more income by raising cows and have a cattle farm in the future.

She is highly obliged to BJS and Kiva for making her self-employed.

loans.use: To purchase a cow for selling milk and milk products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase a double needle sewing machine.

loans.name: Henry Giovani

texts.es: Henry de 40 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, esta casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen tres hijos dos de ellos estudian. Henry es propietario de un camión para trabajar haciendo viajes y es agricultor, necesita el crédito para comprar abono y herbicidas para su cultivo de maíz, desea poder sembrar y trabajar para poder obtener ingresos extras.
texts.en: Henry is 40 years old, is married and has three children, two of whom study. His wife does housework. Henry studied up to Grade 9. Henry is the owner of  a truck which he uses for transport and he is also a farmer. He needs a loan to buy fertilizer and herbicides for his corn crops as he wants to plant and work the land to make more money.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides for his corn crops.

loans.name: Shefali

texts.en:
Shefali is a 34-year-old woman from Maynaguri who lives with her husband and three children in a small hut. Shefali is a hardworking housewife and is illiterate. She only knows how to sign her name. Her children receive an education.

They have their own land where they cultivate different vegetables in different seasons and sell those vegetables in the market. Having their own land and experience in the agricultural field is the reason for choosing this business. Shefali helps her husband in the field. 

Now she wants to extend her farming business and applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase fertilizer and eggplant seeds for cultivation. She plans to generate more income for her family’s well-being. 

Environmental disasters like drought, flood and famine are the main challenges in her agricultural business. Shefali wants to overcome all difficulties and prosper in her life with the support of her business.

Shefali is a very ambitious and courageous lady, who never gives up the fight before she wins. She is very much thankful to BJS and Kiva for their great support.

loans.use: To purchase eggplant seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Noong Luong 5 Group

texts.en:
Sua is a Thai woman age 62 who was elected to be the group leader of Noong Luong 5 Group. She's living in a family of eight members, consisting of her husband, her daughter and daughter-in-law, her two sons and two grandchildren. Although at an advanced age, Sua actively works at agriculture activities to support her family. Specifically, she cultivates rice in the field, and breeds fish, pigs and chickens. Shee also looks after her two grandchildren who are 11 months old and 3 years old. 

Because of her hard-working personality, Sua still wants to expand her business to increase the income for her big family. She heard about Anh Chi Em Program from her neighbors and desired to benefit from the loan and the training from ACE. This is her first loan with Anh Chi Em and she would use the loan to buy more small fish and food for the fish. 

She hopes that by using the loan and applying the knowledge from ACE's training, she will help her family to have a better life, which is less difficult and more abundant. 

In the picture, Sua is wearing a Thai traditional costume and standing first on the right.

loans.use: to buy small fish and food for her fish

loans.name: Shukla

texts.en:
Shukla is a 41-year-old woman from Maynaguri. She lives with her husband and two children. Both she and her husband have completed a higher secondary education. Moreover, her children are also studying in higher classes at the secondary level.

She is a housewife and her husband is running a small business. He makes and sells bamboo cages in the market shops. Her husband has a sound knowledge of making these bamboo cages, which is why he has chosen this business. Shukla helps him in making these cages. 

Due to a lack of capital, they can’t purchase their necessary raw materials for making the cages, so she applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to invest in their bamboo cage business. She hopes this loan will help her to increase business. Shukla thanks BJS and Kiva for helping her financially.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials like bamboo sticks etc. for making bamboo cages

loans.name: Chayna

texts.en:
Chayna is a 35-year-old married woman from Maynaguri. She is a mother of two children. They are studying in different grades at the secondary level. Her husband is 38 years old and involved with a business. 

Chayna always tries to give financial support to her husband and family. Thus, she started the sari business (a traditional women's Indian dress). She sells saris door to door. But due to a lack of capital, she could not buy varieties of saris and hence, the sales were not satisfactory. That’s why she thought to expand her business by buying varieties of saris to expand her business. For that reason, she has applied for a loan of INR 15,000 to BJS (Kiva’s partner). She dreams that her business will flourish with the profit she will gain and she will be able to give a better, prosperous life to her children so that they are not affected by poverty. 

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase saris to sell in her shop

loans.name: Mari Sol

texts.es:
Mari tiene un almacén de ropa desde hace aproximadamente 1 año.
Inicio vendiendo sus prendas a familiares y compañeros de trabajo de manera informal pero decidió dedicarse de pleno a este proyecto a raíz de la separación que tuvo con el que era su esposo que al terminar su relación la dejo sola con sus dos hijos y sin ninguna reserva para su sostenimiento.
Fue así como mari se vio obligada a tomar toda la responsabilidad de su hogar y salir adelante con sus hijos los cuales son el motor de su vida.
Ella solicita un crédito para comprar vitrinas, un exhibidor, realizar el diseño de la publicidad y aumentar su inventario de productos. Esto le permitirá atraer más clientes a su negocio y podrá ofrecerles más variedad de productos, aumentado así sus ventas y afectando positivamente sus ingresos.
Su mayor sueño es poder comprarse una vivienda propia en la cual puedan vivir tranquilamente ella y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mari has had a clothing store for approximately one year.
 
She started selling her clothes to relatives and coworkers informally. She decided to dedicate herself completely to this project following the separation from her husband and ending their relationship. She was on her own with two children without any means of support. 

Mari was forced to take responsibility for her home and move forward with her children who are the driving force of her life. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase display cases,  design advertisements and increase her inventory. This will allow her to attract more customers to her business. She will offer them a greater variety of products, increasing her sales and positively affecting her income. 

Her biggest dream is to be able to buy her own home where she can live calmly with her children.

loans.use: buy display cases, design advertisements and increase her inventory.

loans.name: Norela María

texts.es:
Norela es una mujer de grandes ambiciones y aspiraciones, pues desde hace 2 años inicio con su negocio de elaboración y venta de helados y batidos, obligada por la necesidad de subsistir y darles una vida y estudio dignos a sus 3 hijos.
Ella es separada y desde ese momento tomo las riendas de su hogar y ha tomado toda la responsabilidad en él.
Ella solicita un crédito para comprar algunos elementos para la preparación y almacenamiento de sus productos tales como un chantillera, una mesa de trabajo, una licuadora y utensilios para las preparaciones.
Esto le permitirá realizar su trabajo mas cómoda y productivamente, y así aumentara sus ventas e ingresos.
A pesar de su poca experiencia, ella cuenta con un gran coraje para mantener el negocio y confía plenamente en sus habilidades.
texts.en:
Norela is a woman with grand ambitions and aspirations.  Two years ago, she began a business making and selling ice cream and  milk shakes, obliged by the necessity of subsistence and of offering a dignified life and studies for her 3 children.  

Norela is currently separated and from that initial moment, she took the reigns of her home and all the responsibility for her family.

Norela is requesting a loan to purchase some basic tools for the preparation and storage of her products, including a mixer, a work table, a blender, and the utensils needed for preparation.

This will permit her to perform her work more conveniently and productively, and thus, to increase her sales and income.

Despite Norela's limited experience, she can count on her grand courage to maintain the business; she is plainly confident in her abilities.

loans.use: buy a mixer, a work table, a blender and utensils for preparing her products.

loans.name: Martha Adilia

texts.es: La señora Martha habita en la comarca llamada Esquípula junto a su compañero de Vida quien le apoya en todas los gastos del hogar, el labora como guarda de seguridad, tiene dos hijos en común en edades escolares, ella tiene como actividad comercial, la venta de refrescos, Gaseosas y comida, elabora almuerzo para venderlos en un proyecto que esta por su casa, los cuales genera ganancias para invertir en su casa y negocio, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de Abarrotes como, Arroz, Aceite, Carnes y refrescos. Agradece la confianza que le han brindado al otorgarle este crédito.
texts.en: Martha lives in the region called Esquípula with her life partner who supports her with all the household expenses. He works as a security guard. They have two school-age children together. She sells soft drinks and food and makes lunches to sell in her home which generates income to invest in her home and business. The loan she requested is for the purchase of groceries like rice, oil, meat and soft drinks. She is grateful for the trust given by granting this loan.

loans.use: purchase groceries and soft drinks.

loans.name: Juana Isabel

texts.es: Juana de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado, está casada, su esposo se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura, tienen 3 hijos, actualmente estudia solo uno, la cliente se dedica a los oficios domésticos y le ayuda a su esposo en el trabajo de la agricultura.  Necesita el crédito para la compra de abono,  fertilizantes y herbicidas para su cultivo de maíz. A futuro sueña con poder dejarles a sus hijos un patrimonio para trabajar y vivir en lo propio.
texts.en: Juana is 32 years old. She studied until the fourth grade. She is married. Her husband works in agriculture. They have three children. Currently, only one of the children is studying. Juana is dedicated to household chores and she helps her husband with his farming. She needs the loan to purchase fertilizer and herbicides for corn. She dreams about being able to leave her children an inheritance in the future for working and living.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer and herbicides for corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to help her coffee plants in this season.

loans.name: Reyna Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “REYNA DEL CARMEN”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Cristina ella es convi9viente y tiene 49 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 1 año en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.

La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
 
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de ladrillos, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members of the "REYNA DEL CARMEN" communal bank live in the city of Cusco, which is also the name of the Peruvian province and department where the city is located. 

Señora Cristina is 49, lives with her partner, and is the mother of four children. She has run a grocery store for a year, working from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. and selling basic necessities such as rice, sugar, milk, and cooking oil. The store is doing well, and Señora Cristina hopes to expand it. She is applying for a loan to purchase milk, sugar, cooking oil, and rice.     

One of the Reyna del Carmen members appears in the lower left corner of the photo. She had her picture taken after the group's meeting, which she couldn't attend because she was working.  
 
The other communal bank members work in various businesses, such as clothing sales, brick sales, grocery stores, and a restaurant. 

Señora Cristina would like to thank lenders who are helping her fulfill her ambition and is committed to make her loan payments on time.

loans.use: purchase milk, sugar, cooking oil, and rice.

loans.name: Ana Iris

texts.es: Ana tiene 46 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 23 años de edad. Ana es una mujer emprendedora quien desde hace 15 años comenzó un negocio de tienda en la cual distribuye variedad de productos como: cereales, golosinas, aceite, huevos, detergente, etc. De esta forma ha logrado mantener la economía de su familia y dar a su hija lo necesario. Ana desea mejorar su negocio por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de productos de tienda como: cereales, detergente, aceite, golosinas, huevos, pan dulce, bebidas gaseosas, etc. y así poder morar sus ventas e ingresos y de igual forma sus condiciones de vida y las de su hija.
texts.en: Ana is 46 years old. She lives in her own home with her 23 year old daughter.  Ana is an enterprising woman who 15 years ago started a store where she distributes a variety of products, such as: cereals, snacks, oil, eggs, detergent, etc. In this way, she has been able to maintain her family budget and give her daughter what she needs. Ana wants to improve her business, and so she has decided to ask for a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying a larger quantity of products for the store, such as cereals, oil, detergent, snacks, eggs sweet bread, sodas, etc. This way, she can improve her sales and income as well as her and her daughter's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cereals, detergent, oil, snacks, eggs, sweet bread, soda, etc.

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.es: Jonathan es un joven campesino de 20 años de edad, que hace un año se dedica a la agricultura, más precisamente a la crianza de ganado, comenzó como un empleado el cual tenía que levantarse todos los días muy en la madrugada a realizar el mantenimiento y los respectivos cuidados al ganado. Quiere comenzar a criar su propio ganado por lo cual solicita un crédito para la compra de dos terneros los cuales tendra en la finca donde actualemnte labora, con los que empezara un negocio que sueña con que tenga buenos resultados, para darle todas las comodidades y buena calidad de vida a su esposa y los hijos que esperar tener con ella, comprando una finca y así independizarse y seguir su labor como empresario y no como empleado
texts.en:
Jonathan is 20 years old and works on a farm raising livestock. He began as a laborer, waking up very early each morning to do maintenance and the tasks required to care for the livestock.

Jonathan wants to start raising his own livestock and is applying for a loan to purchase two calves that he'll keep on the farm where he currently works. Jonathan will start his own herd with these two calves and hopes it will be successful. He wants to provide a comfortable home for his wife and the children that they plan to have someday. Jonathan also hopes to purchase a farm that he can run himself instead of working for someone else.

loans.use: to purchase two cows so he can start his business, succeed, and fulfill his and his wife's dreams.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana  de 65 años de edad, solo estudio segundo grado, es casada, el esposo trabaja en la agricultura, tienen once hijos de los cuales uno vive con ella, y todos los demás hijos tienen sus hogares, también tiene cuatro hijos en EEUU, con ella viven dos nietos y una nuera. Ella utiliza el crédito para la agricultura, a lo cual se ha dedicado siempre, este trabajo lo aprendió de su padre, anterior a este trabajo ella negociaba con cerdos, ahora ella solo la cría para destazarlos y vender los derivados de este.
El crédito que actualmente solicita lo necesita para seguir trabajando en la agricultura, siembra de maíz y frijol, comprara semilla, abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas y herbicidas; cree que CREDICAMPO le ha ayudado siempre que ha necesitado para la agricultura. 
Sus planes a futuro son seguir cultivando la tierra, pero ya con la ayuda de mozos pues el esposo por la edad que tiene ya le cuesta, también comprara dos cerdos y los va a destazar para ir cancelando las cuotas.
texts.en:
Juana is 65 years old. She only went to school up to the second grade. She is married and her husband works in agriculture. They have eleven children and only one of them lives with her. All of the others have their own homes. She also has four children in the U.S. and two grandchildren and a daughter on law live with her. She will use the loan for agriculture, which she always done. She learned this work from her father. Previously, she bought and sold pigs. Now she just raises them and butchers them and sells the pork products. 

The loan she is asking for now is to keep working in agriculture by planting corn and beans. She will buy seeds, fertilizer, pesticide and herbicide. She thinks that CREDICAMPO has always helped her with what she needs for farming. Her plans for the future are to keep cultivating the land, but with the help of workers because it is hard for her now because of her age. She will also buy two pigs and butcher them to start making payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, pesticide and herbicide to grow corn and beans.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase raw materials and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Leydy Johana

texts.es:
Leydy es una mujer sensible, de mente creativa y corazón valiente, pues desde que se quedo sin empleo tuvo que ingeniárselas para salir adelante con su esposo y sus 2 hijos pequeños. Es así como decide emprender su proyecto vendiendo productos través del modelo de negocios de Amway por referenciación de un amigo que le conto acerca de esta alternativa.
Este oficio lo combina con su profesión y pasión de cantante, actividad que realiza en eventos y reuniones sociales donde realiza las contrataciones.
El objetico del dinero qu7e solicita es para comprar productos en Amway y así aumentar su inventario, que luego ofrecerá a sus clientes.
Esto le dará un impulso bastante grande en la promoción y venta de sus productos, así podrá aumentar sus ganancias significativamente.
Una de sus metas es pasar de calificación “platino” a “esmeralda”, dicha calificación la otorgan en el modelo de negocios con el que ella labora.
Su motivación para esforzarse cada día es la sonrisa de sus dos hijos pequeños a los cuales trata de proteger y cuidar a toda costa.
texts.en:
Leydy is a sensible woman with a creative mind and a brave heart. Since she lost her job she had to figure out how to get ahead with her husband and two small children. That is how she decided to start her own project selling  product through the Amway business model. She was referred by a friend who told her about this alternative.  

This work combines her profession and passion as a singer, an activity that she does in meetings and events where she does her sales. The purpose of the money she is asking for is to buy Amway products and thus increase her inventory, which she will offer to her customers. This will give her a big sales and promotion drive for her products. She will also increase her earnings significantly. One of her goals is to reach the "platinum" to "emerald" level. These are given by the business model she works with. Her motivation to strive every day is her two children's smiles. She tries to protect and care for them every day.

loans.use: to buy Amway and thus increase her inventory to later sell it.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a machine for balancing tires and to renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Heylin Julissa

texts.es: Doña Heylin, trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia ella tiene un pequeño puesto de frutas y verduras, su esposo labora como chofer para una casa privada, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de materiales de construcción como cemento, zinc, bloques, para terminar de construir su casita, Agradece el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic le han brindado.
texts.en: Heylin works very hard to help her family get ahead. She has a small fruit and vegetable stall and her husband works as a chauffeur. She is requesting the loan to buy building materials such as cement, zinc, blocks, and other materials to be able to build a small house. She is grateful to Kiva and Afodenic for their support.

loans.use: to buy building materials to build a house for her and her family

loans.name: Las Estrellas Del Norte Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS ESTRELLAS DEL NORTE” iniciará el sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Alto Lima, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rebeca es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido de mantas, venta de muebles, fabricación de balones, venta de jugos, servicio de construcción.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rebeca es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una compañera de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido y venta mantas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió en un centro de formación y con un pequeño capital decide emprender este negocio independientemente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lana por mayor) que adquirirá de las ferias tradicionales de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el crédito y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución
texts.en:
The Las Estrellas del Norte communal bank will begin its sixth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Alto Lima regional center.  It is comprised of eight members and led by a board of directors.  Rebeca is the president.  The businesses of the members of the communal bank are varied and include weaving blankets, selling furniture, making balls, selling juices, and construction services.

The loan that they are taking out will benefit small business people where Rebeca is a member.  She states that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for two years.  She joined by invitation from a colleague at the institution who went to visit her at her house.  She currently has a business of weaving and selling blankets.  She states that she learned this business at a training center.  With a little capital she decided to undertake this business independently.

The loan that she will now take out is to increase capital (to buy wool wholesale) that she will get at the traditional fairs in the city of El Alto.  After making the blankets, she will sell them at her sales space.  This way of working allows her to generate resources to support her family.  She is in a common-law marriage and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answered that she likes the loans and the training that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy wool wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an air cooler, fabric and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee plantation

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his son’s education.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabric and a sewing machine.

loans.name: David Enrique

texts.es:
David vive feliz junto a su esposa quien ha sido su gran apoyo en el proceso de salir adelante con su negocio, que consiste básicamente en una tienda de abarrotes y comestibles.
Este negocio lo tiene desde hace 6 meses y aprendió dicho oficio empíricamente impulsado por la necesidad de obtener ingresos para sus hijos universitarios y sostenimiento de su familia.
 Su esposa le ayuda en el establecimiento en algunas ocasiones pues ella también se dedica a realizar trabajos de modistería.
Su principal problema es no contar con un local que sea propio y esta la razón por la que acude a la solicitud de un rubro económico para poder iniciar a pagar el valor de otro local un poco más grande, adicional a esto, parte del dinero lo destinaran para la compra de surtido y así aumentar su inventario.
Su mayor sueño es poder tener su local acreditado y crear fidelidad en sus clientes ofreciendoles productos de buena calidad y oportunamente.
texts.en:
David lives in a happy marriage with his wife who has been very supportive to him in the process of setting up his business, a convenience store. 

He started his business six months ago and learned how to run the business through trial and error, motivated by the necessity for more income to be able to support his children at college and to cover the household expenses. 

His wife helps him in the store from time to time because she also has a job as dressmaker. His main problem is that he does not have his own premises and for that reason he is requesting financial support so that he can make the first payment on a store of his own. 

As well as that, he plans to use some of the money to buy stock so that he can offer a wider range of goods. His greatest dream is to create a well-known store with loyal customers by offering them good-quality products when they need them.

loans.use: to open his own convenience store and buy supplies

loans.name: Anselmo De Jesús

texts.es:
Anselmo cuenta con un negocio de distribución de celulares en el municipio de Valencia, Córdoba (Colombia) desde hace 3 años, negocio que inicio empíricamente y con ayuda de sus padres. Es un hombre muy emprendedor y trabajador, con ganas de progresar y ser alguien en la vida.
El solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de celulares de diferentes marcas y así ofrecer mucha más variedad a sus clientes. Al aumentar su inventario de productos él podrá tener ventas más estables y aumentar significativamente sus ingresos.
Sus sueños no son tan ambiciosos pero si muy importantes para él y son agrandar su negocio, hacerlo productivo y que tenga permanencia en el tiempo.
texts.en: Anselmo has a cell phone distribution business in Valencia, Córdaba (Colombia) which he has been running for three years. He started his business with the help of his parents and has learned how to run it on the job. He is a very enterprising and hard-working man, and wants to get ahead and do something with his life. He is requesting the loan to buy cell phone stock from different brands so that he can offer his customers more variety. Increasing his inventory will allow him to have more steady sales and will increase his profits substantially. His dreams are not very ambitious, but it is very important to him to grow his business, to make it profitable and for it to stand the test of time.

loans.use: to buy a range of cell phone of different brands so that he can offer more variety to his customers

loans.name: Xenia Judith

texts.es:
Xenia, una mujer trabajadora, humilde y emprendedora se dedica a la venta de minutos de celular desde hace 6 meses, oficio que realiza desde su casa en busca de una estabilidad económica que tanto le ha hecho falta a su familia.
Ella vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos pequeños y aunque su compañero trabaja, los ingresos en su hogar no son muy buenos y ella se ha visto obligada a recurrir a este negocio para subsistir.
Ella acude a un apoyo económico para comprar un celular nuevo y un nuevo plan de celular, así podrá ofrecer sus servicios de manera más eficiente y rápida. Sus clientes la preferirán por su buen servicio y esto hará que sus ventas aumenten al igual que sus ingresos.
Su mayor sueño es poder salir de la situación económica tan difícil que en estos momentos están padeciendo y poder ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Xenia is a hard-working, humble, and enterprising woman.  She has been selling cell phone minutes for six months.  She does this from her house in order to find the financial stability that her family needs so much.

She lives with her husband and their two small children.  Even though her life partner works, the income at her house is not very good.  She has been obliged to turn to this business in order to survive.

She is requesting a loan to buy a new cell phone and a new cell phone plan.  This way she will be able to offer her services in an efficient and quick way.  Her customers will prefer her because of her good service.  This will increase her sales and her income.

Her biggest dream is to be able to get out of the difficult financial situation from which they are now suffering and to be able to give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a new cell phone and a new cell phone plan with minutes to sell.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: José tiene 50 años  de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su hijo de 6 años de edad. José es un hombre emprendedor quien  desde hace 8 años trabaja como transportista, con mucho esfuerzo y por medio de financiamientos ha logrado hacerse de su carro el cual es su principal herramienta de trabajo dado que además de hacer viajes a diferentes partes de su localidad también utiliza su transporte para trasladar productos de primera necesidad al hospital de su municipio en el cual trabaja su esposa y juntos mantienen el negocio de venta de productos de hospital que es el negocio por el cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de productos como: sabanas, papel higiénico, detergente, jabón, desinfectante, alcohol, algodón y de más productos de primera necesidad para hospital.
texts.en:
José, age 50, lives in his own house with his wife and his six year old son.  José is an enterprising man who has been working as a driver for eight years.  With great effort, and through the loans, he has managed to get hold of his car.  

This is his main working tool because in addition to making trips to different parts of his area, he also uses it to transport basic needs products to the hospital in his municipality.  His wife works at the hospital, and together they maintain the business of selling hospital products.

It is for this business that he is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  He will use the loan to buy a variety of products like sheets, toilet paper, detergent, soap, disinfectant, alcohol, cotton, and other basic needs products for the hospital.

loans.use: to buy basic needs products for the hospital.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his son's school fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his children's education.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an air-cooler and renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Manuel Enrique

texts.es:
El señor Manuel ha sido un humilde campesino trabajador toda su vida y se gana la vida realizando labores de agricultura.
Este oficio lo aprendió empíricamente desde muy niño al lado de su padre quien le enseño todo lo necesario para sobrevivir.
El trabaja en su propia finca cultivando distintos topos de alimentos como plátano, yuca y frijol, en colaboración con su esposa y su yerno ha sacado sus cultivos adelante todo este tiempo.
El solicita dinero para comprar elementos para la preparación de sus tierras como abonos y riegos, además necesita comprar semillas para realizar sus cosechas. Esto le permitirá seguir ejerciendo su ardua actividad con la que ha sostenido a su familia todos estos años.
Uno de sus sueños es poder tener otra parcela de tierra más grande y allí tener más cantidad de producto, además de generar algunos empleos a las personas de su región.
texts.en:
Manuel has been a humble agricultural worker all his life. He earns his living through this labor. He learned this business by doing it at a very early age with his father who taught him all he needs to know to survive.

He works his own farm growing different types of foods like plantains. yucca and beans. He works with his wife and his son-in-law and together they have harvested their crops.

Manuel is requesting a loan to buy the supplies he needs to prepare the land like fertilizer and irrigation, besides buying the seeds needed for his crops. This will allow him to carry out his strenuous task with which he sustains his family. One of his dreams is to have another larger plot of land and grow a larger quantity of product as well as generate work for a few people from his area.

loans.use: to buy inputs and a variety of seeds.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.en: Vicenta is a 65-year-old widow with nine adult-age children.  She lives in Siloy, Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She is a farmer engaged in corn production.  This is how she supports her family.  She joined Paglaum for the need of capital. She is tilling another area for corn production. For this cropping season, she needs financial assistance to buy additional fertilizers for corn production. Vicenta hopes to sustain her farming activities so she can support her family and her grandchildren.

loans.use: purchase additional fertilizer for corn production

loans.name: Blanca Stella

texts.es:
Blanca es una mujer sensible y muy carismática, amante a los niños aunque no tiene hijos.
Ella tiene una guardería escolar adecuada en su propia casa, desde allí realiza su labor de cuidadora y maestra de estos niños (Ver Foto).
Le gusta siempre estar actualizada, por esta razón está realizando una técnica en atención a la primera infancia y está a punto de graduarse.
Ella solicita un préstamo para realizar algunas mejoras locativas en su guardería como la colocación de una puerta en el balcón, construcción de un muro en el baño e instalación de tejas. Esto le permitirá brindar más seguridad a los niños que tiene a su cargo y generara mayor tranquilidad a los padres.
Ella siente que esta es la misión que tiene en este mundo y es la de cuidar, educar, proteger y formar a los niños como personas de bien y con valores.
Su mayor sueño es graduarse y tener un gran centro infantil y desde allí aplicar todos sus conocimientos a los niños.
texts.en:
Blanca is a sensitive and very charming woman who loves children, even though she has no children. She has a well-equipped nursery school in her own home, and there she does her work of looking after and teaching these children (see photo).

She likes to be always up-to-date, and for that reason is taking a course in early childhood education, and is about to graduate. She is requesting a loan to do some site improvements at her nursery school, such as installing a balcony door, construction of a wall in the bathroom, and installation of roof tiles. This will allow her to offer more safety to the children she has in her charge and will give the parents greater peace of mind.

She feels that this is the mission she has in this world; looking after, raising, protecting and educating children as persons of worth and with values. Her greatest dream is to graduate and have a large childcare center, and there apply all her knowledge to working with the children.

loans.use: To do some site improvements at her nursery school, such as installing a balcony door, construction of a wall in the bathroom, and installation of roof tiles.

loans.name: Vivien

texts.en:
Vivien is 48-years-old and lives in Tuburan Pagadian City Zamboanga del Sur Philippines. She is married with five children.

Vivien has a store that sells goods and dry goods. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for additional capital for her store.  She wants to buy additional inventory of goods and dry goods for her store.

Vivien has been a member of PMPC for six years. In the future, she hopes to build a bigger store.

loans.use: to buy additional inventory of goods and dry goods for her store

location.town: Pagadian - Tuburan, Pagadian City Zamboanga Del Su

loans.name: Luís Alfonso

texts.es:
Don Luis de 49 años de edad, se dedica a brindar sus servicios en una empresa que brinda energía eléctrica él realiza la revisión de contadores. Pero el trabajo fuerte que desempeña es la agricultura, ya que es de donde puede obtener los alimentos básicos del hogar, sus hijos también le apoyan en el trabajo, ellos ya son mayores de edad, y son independientes, uno de ellos se dedica a hacer pan. Don Luis cuenta con noveno grado de educación básica, pero eso no ha sido un obstáculo para seguir adelante, junto a sus hijos y esposa quien se dedica a las actividades del hogar.

Don Luis siempre ha cultivado la tierra, y hace 5 años encontró el trabajo de supervisor de contadores, pero el tiempo que tiene libre se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura, pues es la única forma de poder obtener los alimentos que sustentan a su familia.


Con el préstamo Don Luis podrá comprar todos los insumos que utilizara para la preparación de la tierra donde sembraran maíz, como la semilla, abono, fertilizantes, pago de mano de obra, por el momento no cuenta con el dinero y la temporada agrícola ya comenzó.


Don Luis, lo que desea en un futuro es poder sembrar  diferentes cultivos, a los que normalmente se siembran y así poder tener una variedad de productos que puedan satisfacer las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Luis is 49 years old. He works as an accounting supervisor for an electrical energy company. But the hard work he does is farming. This is where he gets the baisc foods for his family. His children also help him. They are adults and independent. One of them works making bread. Luis has his Grade 9 and this has not been an obstacle for him to get ahead together with his wife, who does the housework and his children. Luis has always farmed and found the accounting supervisor job 5 years ago. When he is not doing this he is working on his land as it is the only way he gets food for his family.

Luis will buy all the supplies he needs to prepare the land where he grows corn with the loan like seeds, manure, fertilizer and pay for labor. At the moment he does not have the money to do this and the growing season has started. Luis in the future would like to plant a variety of crops besides the ones he has now and have a variety of products for his household.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer and pay for labor to grow corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy assorted basic products to meet family needs offer them to her customers in a timely manner.

loans.name: Rita

texts.es:
Rita de 54 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora, a pesar de solo tener segundo grado de educación básica, con mucho esfuerzo a logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos, junto a su esposo un hombre muy luchador que se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas. Anteriormente, Rita salía a comercializar los productos que su esposo cosechaba, hasta que decidieron establecer una tienda, la que hoy tiene 10 años de estar funcionando. Esta tienda le ayuda a que sus hijos puedan estudiar, ya que una de sus hijas estudia bachillerato y un hijo estudia noveno grado.

Con el préstamo, se le estará ayudando a la clienta para que pueda comprar  productos de consumo para su tienda, como verduras, detergentes, artículos del cuidado personal, arroz, frijoles, maíz, etc , ya que por el momento necesita invertir pero no cuenta con los fondos suficientes, por lo que necesita apoyo económico.

En un futuro quiere tener un negocio mas grande en el que pueda tener todo producto, que es de consumo diario. Con los ingresos que de aquí obtenga  podrá ayudar a sus hijos a que continúen estudiando y que en un futuro puedan tener una tienda mas grande que la que por el momento tiene.
texts.en:
Rita is 54 years old. She is an enterprising person, even though she only has a second grade education. With much hard work she has provided for her children, along with her husband, who is a very hard worker who farms vegetables. Rita used to go out and sell the vegetables that her husband harvested until they decided to open a store, which they have had for 10 years now. This store helps their children to study--one of their daughters is in the last two years of high school and a son is in ninth grade. 

With the loan, you will be helping her to buy products for her store such as vegetables, detergents, personal care products, rice, beans, corn, etc. She needs to invest, but doesn't have sufficient funds, which is why she needs the loan. 

In the future she wants to have bigger business where she can have all kinds of products for daily use. With the income she will earn here she will will be able to help her children continue studying and also to have in the future a bigger store than she currently has.

loans.use: to buy products for her store such as vegetables, detergents, personal care products, rice, beans, corn, etc.

loans.name: Fabio Javier

texts.es:
Fabio se desempeña como distribuidor de distintos productos a las tiendas y almacenes. 
Esta actividad la realiza empíricamente desde hace varios años y su única compañera es su fiel motocicleta que utiliza para realizar las entregas.
Es el orgulloso padre de dos hijos pequeños a los cuales adora con todo su corazón y hace hasta lo imposible para que siempre estén bien.
Fabio vio la oportunidad de comprar los productos que el distribuye y así podrá aumentar sus ganancias pues dejaría de ser un simple repartidor y pasaría a ser un comerciante. 
Pero para lograr esto necesita dinero y es por eso que solicita ayuda para comprar surtido de diferentes productos y así tener un inventario bastante amplio para ofrecer a sus clientes, que ya lo conocen y tienen un excelente concepto de él.
Su mayor sueño es poder salir adelante con su idea y progresar al lado de su esposa y sus hijos que son lo más importante en su vida.
texts.en:
Fabio works as a distributor of various products to stores and department stores. He has been in this business four several years and his only company has been that of his loyal motorcycle, which he uses for his deliveries.

He is the proud father of two small children who he adores with all of his heart. He will do anything to make sure they are always okay.

Fabio saw the opportunity to buy the products he distributes so that he can increase his income. He would quit being just a delivery person and would be a distributor.

But in order to do this, he needs money and this is why he's requesting help to buy stock of different products so he will have a big enough inventory to offer to his clients. They already know him and have an excellent opinion of him.

His biggest dream is to to have success with his idea and get ahead in life, along with his wife and his children, who are the important thing in his life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre en constante busca de oportunidades para progresar y salir adelante con su madre con la que actualmente vive.
El se desempeña como conductor de carga pesada y labora en extendidos horarios para ganar ingresos extra y así poder aportar dinero en su casa y además para el sostenimiento de su hijo de 4 años.
En su búsqueda incesante de ingresos estables se entero de los productos de Gano-Excel, ésta una empresa que fabrica y distribuye una amplia gama de productos únicos; desde suplementos alimentarios, bebidas, productos de cuidado personal y cuidado de la piel hasta productos para el hogar. El se entero de estos productos por medio de su madre que los consume.
El desea un apoyo económico para adquirir estos productos al por mayor y así ofrecerlos a su grupo de amigos y conocidos. Su objetivo es poder tener una amplia gama de clientes con los que pueda sostener sus ventas y aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Luis is a man who is always in search of opportunities to get ahead in life, along with his mother, with whom he currently lives. 

He works as heavy cargo driver and works extra hours in order to earn additional income for his household and to support his 4 year old son. 

In his endless search for a stable income, he learned about Gano-Excel products. It's a company that makes and distributes a wide range of unique products, from food supplements, drinks, personal care products, and skin care products to products for the home. He learned about these products from his mother, who uses them. 

He needs some economic help to buy these products at wholesale price so he can sell them to a group of friends and aquaintences. His goal is to have a large number of clients with whom he can sustain his sales and increase his earnings.

loans.use: to buy Gano-Excel products at wholesale price and sell them to a group of friends and acquaintences.

loans.name: 07-Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Năng is 52 years old and she is married with four children. Năng is the group leader of the 04-03-07-Nam Ngạn Solidarity Group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Mrs. Năng has a retail business selling dry food and general things to resell. She is requesting a loan to purchase dry food and general things to resell.

In 2013, Năng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Năng has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Năng has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that Năng faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Năng hopes that her family will be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase dry food and general things to resell.

loans.name: 01 Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Luân is 65 years old and she is married with three children. She is the leader of a four member group, the 11-06-01 Trường Thi Solidarity Group. Luân lives in Thanh Hoa City, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

Luân works in agriculture, raising poultry and cattle, and she is applying for a loan to purchase poultry and cattle to raise and resell in the future.

This is Luân's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Luân has been involved in this business for five years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Luân hopes that her family will be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and cattle to raise and resell in the future

loans.name: Doralba Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Doralba es de esas personas que al hablar con ellas transmiten alegría y ganas de vivir, es una mujer pujante y emprendedora, con ideas claras y metas fijas para su vida y la de sus 6 hijos.
Ella ha trabajado gran parte de su vida en negocios de comida para sacar a sus hijos adelante y sostener su hogar.
En estos momentos tiene el proyecto de iniciar con su propio negocio en preparación y venta de comidas rápidas como hamburguesas, perros, pizza, pinchos y arepas rellenas. Piensa prepararlos y venderlos a domicilio, así podrá obtener algunos ingresos extra.
Por eso recurre a un crédito para comprar una mesa de trabajo y una freidora, por otro lado comprara insumos para sus preparaciones.
Esto le permitirá tener unas ganancias estables y podrá dar empleo a algunos de sus hijos con los domicilios, es decir que será un negocio muy familiar.
Su sueño es tener un local grande donde pueda ofrecer distintos tipos de alimentos y bebidas al público.
texts.en:
When you talk to Doralba, she conveys joy and the love of life. She is a vibrant and enterprising woman with clear ideas and goals for her life and for her six children.
She has worked most of her life in the food business, taking care of her children and maintaining her home. 
Right now, she is planning to start her own business making and selling fast food such as hamburgers, hot dogs, pizzas, kebabs, and stuffed arepas. She thinks she will prepare and sell at home so that she can earn some extra income.
So, she has applied for a loan to buy a working table and a fryer. She will also buy ingredients for her preparations.
This will give her a stable income and she may employ some of her children. It will be a family business.
Her dream is to have a great place where she can offer various types of food and beverages to the public.

loans.use: to purchase a working table, fryer, and ingredients to make food

loans.name: Soy's Group

texts.en:
Soy is a 28-year-old villager and the father of one little kid from the Dambae district of Kampong Cham Province. Soy farms rice and cassava for income. Soy has been involved in this current business for five years, earning an income of about 35,600 KHR per day. 

This is a first-time loan for Soy and second loan for his joint-borrower. The positive impact of his past loan has helped him to improve his lifestyle gradually. Now, he is applying for 2,000,000 KHR; it is the same loan amount as his co-borrower. As the leader, he will spend his entire loan portion to pay for the labor, plowing and transplanting fees, as well as to buy fertilizer for his farmland. He strongly hopes that he will gain a better yield and sell it for a good price.

loans.use: To pay for labor, plowing and transplanting fees and to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Kea's Group

texts.en:
Kea is 42 year old, single and from a local village located in the Koh Sotin district of Kampong Cham province. She weaves scarves as the main source of her income and does other jobs to supplement her income. She has been with this business for 24 years and she earns 25,000 KHR per day. 

This is the first time Kea  and her co-borrower have worked with VisionFund. She is requesting a loan for 1,200,000 KHR to buy yarn for her weaving business. She hopes her business will better her living situation and to own a decent house.

loans.use: To buy yarn for her weaving business

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es:
Teresa de 40 años de edad, es una mujer que lucha cada día para sacar adelante a sus 8 hijos e hijas, y poder darles el estudio, el mayor de sus hijos tiene 16 años y estudia primer año de bachillerato, tiene que caminar 4 kilómetros de su casa hasta su lugar de estudios. Sus otros 5 hijos estudian educación básica, cerca de donde viven. Dos de sus hijos ya no viven con ella, ya que se fueron a buscar trabajo. Teresa junto a su esposo un hombre que se dedica a la agricultura, buscan la manera de poder darle a sus hijos una vida de calidad.

Teresa tiene tres años de dedicarse a la sastrería, esta actividad la realiza por las tardes, haciendo uniformes estudiantiles, anteriormente ella solo hacia arreglos, hasta que el programa de FOMILENIO le brindo una capacitación para  aprender a hacer uniformes completos. Por la mañana Teresa
apoya a su esposo en las actividades agrícolas.


Con el préstamo la cliente podrá comprar insumos agrícolas, como semilla, abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas y pago de mano de obra;  ya que es de la agricultura de donde su familia obtiene sus alimentos para subsistir el año, debido a que la sastrería solo le genera una cierta cantidad para su gasto.


Teresa quiere que sus hijos sean personas de utilidad a la sociedad y que no abandonen sus estudios como sus dos hijos mayores, quienes por la dificultad económica decidieron irse a buscar trabajo para poder apoyar. Es por eso que ella lucha cada día.
texts.en:
Teresa, 40, is a woman who works hard everyday in order to raise her eight children and give them the opportunity to study. The oldest child is 16 years old and is in his first year of high school. He has to walk four miles from his home to his school. Her other 5 children are in elementary school, nearby their home. Two of the children no longer live with her since they went to look for work. Tersa and her husband - a man who earns his living in agriculture - seek ways to give their children a better life.
Teresa has been a tailor for three years. She does this work in the evenings. She makes student uniforms. Previously, she had only done clothing repairs until she attended training at FOMILENIO's program to learn how to complete uniforms. 
Every morning, she works with her husband on the farm.
The loan will be used to buy agricultural inputs such as seed, fertilizer, manure, pesticides, herbicides, and paying laborers. Agriculture is where her family gets their hoof to survive and generated a certain amount for spending.
Teresa wants her children to be useful to society. She wants them to continue their studies unlike their two children who decided to find work due to economic hardship. For this reason, she works hard every day.

loans.use: to purchase seed, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, and to pay laborers.

loans.name: Nueva Asunción Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVA ASUNCIÓN” iniciará el sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Alto Lima, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Sonia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de mantas, tienda de espejos y llaveros, tejido y venta de chompas, tienda de escabeches, confección de chamarras.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Sonia es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una compañera de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de espejos; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su madre, ya que ella ayudaba en su venta desde niña, cuando empezó a convivir con su pareja decide independizarse.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de espejos por mayor) que adquirirá de las distribuidoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el crédito y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The lending group Nueva Asuncion will begin their 6th cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Focal Center of Alto Lima. The group has 8 members and a board of directors, of which Sonia acts as president. The members have varied businesses including: selling blankets; a store for mirrors and key chains; knitting sweaters; selling pickles; and making coats.

The loan will benefit these small business owners, including Sonia. She has been with Pro Mujer for 2 years, joining at the invitation of a friend from the institution who came to her home. Currently she has a business selling mirrors. She learned the business from her mother, helping her from a young age. When she began to live with her husband, she decided to make her own store. She will use the loan to increase her capital, buying mirrors at wholesale from the distributors in El Alto and later selling them in her commercial space. This work allows her to generate resources to support her family, which includes her husband and two children. When asked what the likes most about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the loan and the trainings that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy mirrors at wholesale

loans.name: Yeng's Group

texts.en:
Yeng is 39 years old and a mother of three children who are still in school. She earns income by selling groceries and farming rice. Now Yeng is applying for a loan of 2,000,000 KHR. As the leader of her loan group, she will spend her entire loan portion to start a new business, pig farming. Yeng will purchase piglets and feed to get her business going strong. 

The positive impact of her loan has enabled her to support her kids in school and have a better life than before. She hopes that her business will improve and enable her to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed.

loans.name: Sam Phoirs

texts.en:
Sam Phoirs is a widow with one daughter, who attends an university. She lives with her aunt on an island in the Mekong River, about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh. 

Sam Phoirs is a silk weaver. She wants to continue her weaving business since it is a traditional profession. She is applying for a loan to buy weaving materials and she will also use a portion of the loan to pay school fees for her daughter.

loans.use: To buy weaving materials for her business and also to pay school fees for her daughter.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es: Felicitas se dedica a la venta de productos secos como maíz, cebada, trigo y otros productos, ella continua llevando a vender productos secos a la ciudad de Pilcopata y cuando regresa trae fruta como plátanos, naranjas, piñas, cocona, carambola, coca, achote y otros. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más frutas y poder incrementar su capital de negocio.
texts.en: Felicitas sells dried goods like corn, barley, wheat and other things. She carries her products to the city of Pilcopata for sale, and when she comes back she brings fruits like plantains, oranges, pineapples, cocona, starfruit, coca leaves, annatto and others. On this occasion she needs a loan to buy more fruits and increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy more fruits.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her and purchased more products for her variety store. Her income from her business is assisting with their household expenditures. She works hard to provide for their everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan for her to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add in her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better her profit. Her income will definitely sustain her family's daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Marilyn hopes that her business will flourish and dreams to have a better standard of living. 

* All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis.  A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners.  The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages to sell in her business.

loans.name: Channea's Group

texts.en:
Channea farms rice and cassava in Kampong Cham province. She is 31 years old and has two children who attend school. She has been involved in her current business for 11 years and she earns around 20,000 KHR per day. Channea now leads a group of two who have applied for a loan with VisionFund. Channea is a fifth-time borrower and has fully repaid her loans. Those loans enabled her to support the business.

Channea is now seeking a loan for 500,000 KHR. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for plowing, labor fees, and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to earn more income so that she can keep her children in school and to start a new business.

loans.use: To pay for plowing, labor fees, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Deb's Group

texts.en:
Deb is 44 years old and a mother of four kids, one of whom is in school. She lives in Dambae district of Kampong Cham province. Rubber farming is the main source for her income to feed the family. Additionally, she also grows cassava to supplemental her income. The business that she has been engaged in for ages has returned her 30,800 KHR per day. 

This is the second cycle loan for Deb while her joint-borrower is a first-time borrower. Deb has repaid her past loan with success and it has helped her to upgrade her living conditions at a gradual pace. She and her co-borrower are seeking for 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for rubber tree seedlings and fertilizer. She strongly hopes that she can gain a better yield than before.

loans.use: To pay for rubber tree seedlings and fertilizer

loans.name: Juan Fernando

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre que dedica a aplicar los conocimientos adquiridos al lado de su padre quien le enseño todo acerca del oficio de carpintería.
En estos momento es el administrador del negocio que le heredo su padre y es una taller de carpintería muy reconocido y a acreditado en su sector gracias a la puntualidad y compromiso con sus clientes.
Este taller genera alrededor de tres empleos, pero el objetivo de Juan es poder ampliarlo y generar más unidades de trabajo.
El solicita un apoyo económico para comprar algunas cargas de madera y poder cumplir con unos pedidos que tiene represados por falta de materia prima.
Uno de los desafíos que enfrenta actualmente es la cantidad de pedidos que actualmente tiene y no ha podido cubrir, pues esto hace que sus clientes se empiecen a llevar una mala imagen del negocio.
texts.en:
Juan works hard to apply the knowledge learned at his father's side to his business as a carpenter. He manages the business that he inherited from his dad, a locally well-known carpentry workshop, recognized for its punctuality and commitment to its customers. The workshop generates about three full-time jobs, but Juan's goal is to grow this business and create more work opportunities.

He asks for a loan to buy some loads of wood and meet orders that are pending because he lacks the material. One of his current challenges is the quantity of orders and his inability to complete them, which will give his customers a bad image of the business.

loans.use: to buy loads of wood in order to meet orders that are pending.

loans.name: Arnita

texts.en:
This is Arnita, 59, resident of Caloocan, Philippines. She is a widow and she has four children, all currently working. She works hard to provide for her family’s everyday needs. Aside from her variety store, she also sells diapers for additional income.

Arnita operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy a sachet of shampoo, a 5 PHP-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. Arnita earns profit by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling them individually. Her regular customers are her neighbors and local community members. She earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales, every day.

She is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages, to expand her product inventory.

Arnita dreams of having a supermarket someday and hopes to have good health. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week. There, she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business

loans.name: Sokkoeun

texts.en:
Sokkoeun (in photo) is 32 years old and lives with her aunt on an island of Mekong River, about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh. She has been married since 2004 and has one, young son. She also has one brother who is a garment factory worker and who is also living with her.

Sokkoeun raises cows at home and produces palm sugar for sale. Her husband assists his wife in the business. 

She wants to buy a motorcycle for her brother to drive to work, but she does not have enough money. Hence, she decided to apply for a loan in order to make the purchases.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for her brother to drive to work

loans.name: Jhon Henry

texts.es:
Jhon ejerce una actividad que según él ha sido un vocación toda sus vida.
Desde que era un niño manifiesta que le gustaban muchísimo las ventas, tanto así que vendía dulces en su colegio. Cierto día le manifestó a su madre que quería vender golosinas y frituras en su casa, su madre acepto y lo apoyo totalmente con su proyecto. Desde entonces ha ido creciendo y progresando con su negocio y ahora tiene una gran tienda de abarrotes que ha ido puliendo con los años, con muy buena atención a sus clientes y una gran variedad de productos.
El solicita un préstamo pues quiere surtir su negocio con un gran inventario de productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes. Esto le permitirá mantener un nivel de ventas estable y aumentaran significativamente sus ganancias. Su principal responsabilidad es la manutención de su familia compuesta por su esposa y dos hijos pequeños los cuales desea sacar adelante con esfuerzo y dedicación.
Su mayor sueño es tener un supermercado de autoservicio.
texts.en:
Jhon works at a job that, according to him, has been his calling all his life. He expresses that he has really liked sales since he was a boy, so much so that he used to sell candy in his high school. One day he told his mother that he wanted to sell candy and fried food, she agreed and completely supported him with his project. Since then he has been growing and improving his business and now he has a large grocery store that he has been perfecting over the years, with a lot of attention towards his customers and a large variety of products.

He is requesting a loan because he wants to stock his store with a large assortment of products to offer to his customers. This will allow him to maintain a stable level of sales and significantly increase his profit. His main responsibility is supporting his family, made up of his wife and two small children whom he wants to raise with dedication and effort. His biggest dream is to have a self-service supermarket.

loans.use: to stock his shop with a large assortment of products to offer to his customers.

loans.name: Sasthi Self Help Group

texts.en:
The Sasthi Self Help Group is led by Alokrani (hand raised). The group is native to the village of Mahabbatnagar in West Bengal. Alokrani has been a part of this group for the last 18 years. She lives with her husband and a son. Alokrani, in her fifties, always yearned for a bright future for her son and to educate him until graduation. Her son has completed a Bachelor of Arts. They live in a house made of mud with thatched roofing. 

They have their own cultivatable paddy field, where they grow Boro crop (a type of paddy). Alokrani has good experience in paddy cultivation. Her son and husband help her in the paddy cultivation. The current income is not enough to meet the family’s expenditures. She wants to take on additional paddy cultivation to have a sustainable income, for which she is requesting a loan to buy high-quality paddy seeds, fertilizers and manure. She wants to save to buy new land. 

Other members of the group will go for paddy cultivation, fish farming, poultry farming, and one will open a grocery shop, for which they need a loan of INR 125,000. They all hope their new ventures will increase their earnings and fulfill their dreams of a secure future for their families. 

In their endeavor, these women are helped by local NGO, Sabuj Sangha, which works in the field of women’s empowerment and provides them with necessary training to carry on various income-generating activities.

loans.use: to buy high-quality paddy seeds, fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Annapurna Self Help Group

texts.en:
Aspirations of a prosperous future for children, welfare of the family and society, along with an aim to the upliftment of the village as a whole, brought this group of women together. The Annapurna Self-help group, working under the aegis of Sabuj Sangha, provides support to women in the rural areas to contribute to the income of their families and improve their living standards.

The group hails from the village of Mahabbatnagar in West Bengal. The village is the one of the most remote in the region and even lacks basic amenities like pakka (not made of concrete and mortar) houses, electricity, etc. But the village is rich in spirit and the ideas of its women folk who want to be something in life. And this change in attitude has been brought by the continuous efforts of Sabuj Sangha.

Kabita, a grandmother in her fifties who has a family of eight, has been the leader of the group for the past fifteen years. She has never defaulted on any of her borrowing to date and is running her single shop of medicines in the village successfully. She is supported in her endeavor by her family and other members of the group. Now she wants to make her business bigger to become sustainable and leave her mark in the village.

Through Kabita’s motivation and training, other members in the group also want to foray into the wonderland of prosperity by starting a new enterprise or expanding the current business. Kabita will invest the amount to buy new medicine stock for her shop. 

Another member named Aparna wants to follow the steps of the leader by opening a medical shop, Alok want to cash in on her family’s skill of betel leaves cultivation, and Gita and Saraswati want to go for paddy cultivation.

These aspirants only fall back because of lack of financial options and need a loan of INR 145,000. Such a group of hardworking and experienced ladies needs to be appreciated, to make them the forerunners in the much-needed reforms.

loans.use: to buy medicine stock for her shop.

loans.name: Chayanika Self Help Group

texts.en:
Every parent wants to earn at least that much with which she can provide her children with education and facilities, to make them capable to stand on their feet and reach the zenith of success in their lives. And this hope gets shattered daily because of lack of knowledge, training and capital in rural areas of India. 

But this group of ladies from Madhusudanchawk village in West Bengal has found a solution in their leader Bijali. Bijali, along with the help of her husband, cultivates paddy and is a role model for the group members. The income generated is insufficient to support her family, and she wants to increase the cultivatable land area along with the yield from the land to have higher earnings.

Bijali’s only son has passed class eighth this year, and she wants to educate him further. She herself has studied until class eighth and lives in a mud house with poor electricity facilities. Bijali joined the Chayanika Self Help Group (SHG), associated with NGO Sabuj Sangha, along with other women. Bijali has repaid all the previous loans taken by her on time. Sabuj Sangha provides requisite knowledge, training and motivation to women to be independent and be earning hands for their families. 

The SHG of five seeks a loan of INR 122,000 to resolve their capital requirements. The leader, Bijali, will use the loan for buying better seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to increase paddy cultivation. This will help increase the crop yield, and she will be able to earn more. 

The other members of the group will also engage in paddy and vegetable cultivation. The village, rich in water resources and cultivable land, also strengthens the women’s cause.

The group of women is extremely thankful to the NGO Sabuj Sangha for their support and salutes the continuous dedication of investors towards social upliftment.

loans.use: to buy better seeds, fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Subham Self Help Group

texts.en:
Agriculture has been a prime source to earn a livelihood in India for close to 60% of the population. India has one of the world’s largest production of paddy crops.
