loans.name: Shabana

texts.en:
Shabana is a 41-year-old married woman. She deals in a business of selling cloth in her locality. She buys different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business to contribute to the family income. 

Shabana is requesting a 40,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of fabric in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Sanan

texts.en:
Sanan is a 23-year-old, single refugee, who lives with parents in an IDP settlement. He is a laborer, but his main job is raising and selling seasonal fruits and vegetables. He has been working in this area for two years and has good skills. His monthly income is 220 AZN.

Fruits and vegetables are in high demand in Azerbaijan because people like to eat them fresh. They buy fruits in order to make juice, jams and fruit pies. People use vegetables when they cook delicious national dishes such as kuku, dovgha, pomidor dolmasi, badimjhan dolmasi, etc. 

Sanan’s income doesn’t cover the family’s living expenses. He applied for 1,200 AZN in order to buy good garden tools and build a small greenhouse. This will increase productivity of his garden and monthly income, and he will be able to cover the family’s demands.

loans.use: to buy good garden tools and build a small greenhouse.

loans.name: Habil

texts.en:
Habil is 36 years old and married with three daughters. The members of his family are refugees and have lived in an IDP settlement for a long time. His wife is a housekeeper and educates girls. Habil has been raising and selling seasonal vegetables for seven years and his monthly income is 220 AZN. He has good skills in this area and knows what his customers prefer.

Habil sells vegetables at a local bazaar for usual people and restaurants. The chefs of restaurants get vegetables from his grocery all the time because the products there are always fresh and clean.

Habil’s income doesn’t cover the family’s demands. He applied for 1200 AZN in order to buy seeds and raise new kinds of vegetables and fruits. This will expand his grocery's assortment, increase income and Habil will be able to provide his lovely daughters a good education and bright future.

loans.use: to buy seeds and raise new kinds of vegetables and fruits

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is a forty-seven-year-old tailor and food kiosk owner in Mazeras, Mariakani, Kenya. She is a married mother of three who has operated the two businesses for the last fifteen years and has done well. Her spouse provides additional income.

This marks her fifth borrowing from VisionFund Kenya to finance her business. She will use the loan to purchase clothing material for school uniforms and the anticipated profit to expand her food kiosk as well as repay her loan. She hopes to be a successful business lady in the future.

loans.use: to purchase clothing material for school uniforms

loans.name: Zahra

texts.en:
Zahra is a 55-year-old, married woman. She has been helping in her husband's business of furniture-making. They have been doing it together for many years. Over time, they have become famous for providing good-quality furniture in her community. She is a responsible mother of six children and is liable to provide them with the basic necessities of life. 

In order to purchase good-quality wood with packs of polish and nails in larger quantity, she applied for a loan of PKR 45,000 (Pakistan rupees) from Kashf Foundation. In this way, they would be able to cater to more customers without delay, which ultimately helps in bringing more cash home. 

Zahra dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase good-quality wood with packs of polish and nails in larger quantity.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en: Anahit is from Hatsik village where she lives with her husband. Their children are married and live separately with their own families.  Anahit and her husband have been farmers for many years. Their farm currently includes livestock (a cow, three calves and 30 chickens) as well as arable land where different types of vegetables and fruit trees are cultivated. Anahit requested this loan of USD 3,000 to be able to invest in her farm. She needs the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and fuel needed for land cultivation, as well as hire workers for gathering the harvest. Please help these hard working farmers to make their farm more sustainable.

loans.use: to pay for seeds, fertilizer and fuel for land cultivation, as well as hire workers for gathering the harvest.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 65 years old, from Nyandarua South, and he is married. Together with his wife they have two children aged 23 years and 18 years old. His spouse is a farmer.  Joseph has a butchery business that he has been running for many years. He has applied for his fourth loan from VisionFund Kenya to enable him to buy livestock to slaughter in his butchery. He hopes to use the profits to pay back the loan.  Joseph hopes to expand his business and become the leading supplier of meat in his area.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Kaniz

texts.en:
Kaniz, age 43, is a married woman and the mother of three children. She deals in the business of selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

She needs to improve her business to cover her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more animals. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and her income level. She is in her 7th loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Tamam

texts.en: Tamam is from Arevik village and lives with her husband. Their only son is a migrant worker in a neighboring country.  Tamam and her husband are famers. They cultivate pepper and watermelon, as well as keep a grape orchard. They sell the gathered harvest in local open markets and gain income for their living.  The requested loan amount of USD 1,500 will be a big support to purchase seeds and fertilizer needed for Tamam's farm.  She asks lenders to help her with current farming costs and will be very grateful to lenders for their support.

loans.use: to pay for seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 54-year-old Mpesa operator at Mariakani, Kenya. She is a single mother of three, who has been in this business for the last 13 years and has done well. 

This marks her fifth borrowing from VisionFund Kenya to finance her business. She will use the loan to increase her money float for operating Mpesa and the anticipated profit to repay her loan and educate her children. 

She hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to increase her money float for operating Mpesa.

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna is from Yerevan. She lives with her daughter and her son, who is a migrant worker in a neighboring country. Susanna has been involved in sewing for 20 years. She receives orders from locals in her town. The requested loan will be a big support for Susanna, enabling her to purchase cloth in order to provide sewing services and cover her current orders. 

She has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. Please help Susanna to meet her clients' demands and gather income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase cloth for providing sewing services.

loans.name: Tafian

texts.en:
Tafian is a 57-year-old married lady and has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan of 55,000 PKR which she will use to buy a stock of rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital. She is in her 8th loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy a stock of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Asia

texts.en:
Asia has expertise in embroidery and has been using her skill to provide for her family for over 7 years now. She started this line of work at a very young age. During the initial years of her business she barely made enough money to purchase the required material. Today she is proud to be famous in her community as the best at making beautiful patterns with thread and beads, and she counts a good client list.  

To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy reels of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment. In this way she will be able to cater to more customers consistently. She is hopeful of getting an increase in her income by targeting more customers. She is in her 5th loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy reels of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones.

loans.name: Hassena

texts.en:
Hassena is a 41-year-old married lady and has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Hassena makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR which she will use to buy a stock of rice, sugar and beverages from the market at lower rates. In this way she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Hassena wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy a stock of rice, sugar and beverages.

loans.name: Vugar

texts.en:
Vugar is 22 years old, single and a gardener. He is a refugee who lives with his parents in an IDP settlement. The main source of income for the family is raising and selling seasonal vegetables (cucumbers, onions, greens etc.). This brings him about 180ZN monthly but he also gets additional earnings working as a laborer in his free time.

Raising vegetables is very popular in Azerbaijan because people have high demand in fresh vegetables. They use these products to prepare delicious fresh salads and national dishes. 

Vugar’s parents are old and they need good care but this isn’t possible with his small income. So Vugar wants to increase productivity, income and provide his parents with a good life, because it’s very hard for refugees to pay for medicines. He applied for 1,200AZN in order to buy new good fertilizers and garden tools.

loans.use: to buy new good fertilizers and garden tools.

loans.name: Asmahhan Group

texts.en:
Wafaa is the featured borrower of the Asmahhan group. She joined up with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, because they have always been neighbors and they trust each other. They all intend to develop their living and business, and the acquired loan is their only hope.

Wafaa is a 44-year-old married mother of five children. She has been working as a hairdresser for twenty-five years, and is well known in her region with the special talents she acquired during this period. She runs her business at home, and visits some of her customers’ homes upon request. 

She is developing her business, but her income combined with her husband’s are barely covering their family’s increasing expenses. For this reason her acquired loan will be invested in buying necessary highlighting needs, a wax machine and its required chair. Wafaa will use part of the loan to buy a gift for her son’s engagement. She hopes to keep on developing and expanding her business and providing her customers with different requested services.

Wafaa is the lady standing at the center of the picture. As for the other group members, Aya is the first on the left, and Asmahan is the first on the right.

loans.use: To buy necessary highlighting needs, a wax machine and its required chair. Wafaa will use part of the loan to buy a gift for her son’s engagement.

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es: Faustino de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar el es muy conocido en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz entre otros, es muy dedicado a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que lo buscan y lo prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco más la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que Faustino solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
Faustino is 35 years old and lives in a house he owns with his family. He is very well known in the area where he lives for his humility and dedication to his work. He has never given up and has always overcome his difficulties. With effort and dedication he has a store in which he sells products of primary need such as basic grains, milk, eggs and rice, among other items. He is very dedicated to his work and very helpful when selling; this is why he has customers who seek him out and prefer him for his products. 

He has seen the need to stock his store a bit more due to increased demand and he doesn't have the capital to do so. Faustino is therefore asking for a loan to buy more products like basic grains, instant products, candy, drinks, etc. 

He trusts in God that the help he is asking for will be granted soon and that he will no longer worry about how to sustain his home on a daily basis.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, candy, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en: Hellen is 28 years old. Hellen learned about VisionFund Kenya from a poster. She has acquired her first loan of KES 30,000 that will facilitate the purchase of more cereals for the business. The proceeds will be used to cater to the family's basic needs. Hellen hopes to purchase a posho mill, so she can mill flour in the quest to expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase cereals to sell.

loans.name: Arev

texts.en: Arev is a young farmer living in Lanjazat village. She lives with her husband, parents-in-law, and a little daughter. The family owns a farm. They cultivate tomatoes, as well as keep an orchard where different types of fruit trees are cultivated (apricot, plum and nut). To create comfortable conditions for their farm, Arev applied for this loan. The loan of USD 2,960 will help Arev to organize cultivation, work as well as hire workers for gathering the harvest.  Arev and her whole family will be very grateful to lenders for receiving their support and trust.

loans.use: to pay for organizing cultivation work, as well as hire workers for harvest gathering.

loans.name: Miranda

texts.en:
Miranda is a 29-year-old, married woman, from Tbilisi city. She lives with her husband and mother-in-law, who is temporarily unemployed. Miranda's husband is a car-washer and generates approximately 300 GEL monthly. As the existing income is not enough for the three-member family, and she can’t find a job, she decided to start her own business. Particularly Miranda has just opened a grocery store and works there herself. Now she has requested a loan for purchasing stocks of needed products for her store. Having many kinds of products, Miranda will be able to attract more clients and gain more profits. 

Miranda's request was approved with the joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, that gives people a chance to start or re-start businesses. She is a very enthusiastic and hardworking person, with a great desire to do her bit for the family's welfare.  This credit will be a great support for the family. Miranda is thankful to Kiva lenders for giving her a chance to generate income and become financially independent.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en: Isabel is 59 years old, and has ten children. She is married and has one child who is still in school. Isabel is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Isabel has been in pig fattening for eight years now, and has borrowed 26 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Isabel would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Lilit

texts.en: Lilit lives in Artashat with her mother and brother. She studies at university. Her mother is an agronomist and her brother is a policeman. The family is able to gather enough income for sustaining its living. Lilit currently asks for this loan to be able to pay for university tuition so she can continue her studies there. She asks lenders to help her with these expenses.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Zaruhi

texts.en: Zaruhi lives in Ayntap village with her husband, two little daughters, her mother-in-law and brother-in-law.  Zaruhi teaches at a local village school and her husband is a furniture maker. The family also runs a farm. Specifically, near the village where their house is located, Zaruhi and her family rent a small piece of land and cultivate different types of fruits and vegetables (tomato, apricot, plum, pear). The requested loan of USD 3,000 will be a big support for Zaruhi to improve their farming business. She asks for this loan to be able to pay for land rental costs, purchase seeds and hire workers for gathering the harvest. Please help this hardworking family to continue to develop their farm in a sustainable way.

loans.use: to pay for land rental costs, seeds, and to hire workers for gathering the harvest.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.en:
Celsa, a 57-year-old married mother of one, works very hard to provide for her family. For the past three years, Celsa has been operating a general store in the Philippines selling a variety of items such as rice, juice, coffee, detergent soap, shampoo, cereals, biscuits, etc.  

Celsa has requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to purchase more such items to sell.  She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items like rice, juice, coffee, detergent soap, shampoo, cereals, biscuits, etc. to sell

loans.name: Tereza

texts.en: Tereza lives in Hnaberd village with her husband and daughter, Arpine. She has been involved in agribusiness for eleven years, running a farm. The farm includes a livestock of two calves, as well as arable land where fruit trees are grown. The requested loan of USD 3,000 will be a big support for Tereza to enlarge her farm. With the help of the loan Tereza will be able to purchase five oxen and forage for the livestock. Please help Tereza to develop her farming business.

loans.use: to pay for five oxen and forage for the livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plantain seed stock, fertilizer, tools, and other inputs for a plantain project

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijas, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, fríjol desde hace varios  años y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para asistir sus cultivos, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego salir a comercializarlos en los mercados de granaos basicos que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Manuel solicita un credito para poder comprar los insumos necesarios como fertilizantes, herbicidas, abonos, entre otras cosas para tener buenas cosechas y asi el pueda obtener  mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica
texts.en:
Manuel, 53 years old, lives in his own home with his wife and his two daughters. He has worked growing corn and beans for many years. This has given him the necessary experience to help his crops. When his harvest is ready, he stores it in the granaries which are shown in the photograph, and then he goes out to sell it in the markets of staple grains which are found near his place of residence. With the income he makes from his sales, he manages to meet the costs of his household.

Manuel is requesting a loan to be able to buy the necessary supplies such as fertilizers, herbicides, manure, etc. to be able to have good harvests. This is how he will be able to get better earnings, to give his family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides, manure, etc.

loans.name: Juan  Ernesto

texts.es: Juan de 43 años de edad se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 17 años. De esta forma es como se gana la vida. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable, no se cansa de trabajar y de dar lo mejor a su familia. Siempre está al pendiente de su familia ya que para él es su principal fuente de inspiración y desea poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar. Ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar este crédito ya que la temporada en la que se realiza la siembra, se aproxima, y quiere estar preparado con los principales insumos agrícolas como: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografía. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Juan, 43 years old, has worked growing corn and beans since he was 17 years old. This is how he makes a living. He is a hardworking man, honorable and responsible, working tirelessly to give the best to his family. He always wrapped up in his family, as for him, they are his greatest source of inspiration and he wants to be able to improve their living conditions.

He lives in his own home with his family. He has decided to approach the organization to request this loan, as the sowing season is approaching, and he wants to be ready with the basic farming supplies such as manure, pesticides, seeds etc. and to improve his plot of land, which is shown in the photograph.

He hopes to have favorable results as he doesn't have any other source of income. He trusts in God that he will have an abundant harvest, which will enable him to continue putting food on the family table.

loans.use: to buy manure, pesticides, seeds etc and improve his plot of land.

loans.name: Zulma Aracely

texts.es: Zulma de 29 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace varios años se decidió en poner una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de los años, Cuenta con mucha clientela que la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que ellos buscan, Zulma solicita un prestamo a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Zulma is 29 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and her daughter. She is an enterprising person and works hard. Several years ago, she decided to open a small store, which with much hard work and dedication she has managed to keep open through the years. She has many customers who prefer her because she always has what people are looking for. Zulma is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL in order to invest in her store and stock it with all kinds of products, such as: rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, sweets, cooking oil, paper, detergent, and other attractive products for her customers. She is certain that in this way she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, sweets, cooking oil, paper, detergent, and other items.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria de 40 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijas.  Maria posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos de primera necesidad como: pan, leche, huevos, alimentos enlatados, agua embotellada, verduras y otros productos más. Ella es una persona muy responsable y amable la cual cuenta con varios clientes a pesar que su tienda no tiene mucha variedad de productos. Maria solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de productos, ya que el mayor deseo de ella es el de poder surtir su negocio y así percibir mayores ganancias. Maria es una madre de familia muy responsable quien desea mucho poder brindarle todo lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en: Maria is 40 years old and lives with her husband and two daughters. Maria has a store where she sells items of basic need, such as: bread, milk, eggs, canned foods, bottled water, vegetables, and other products. She is a very responsible and friendly person who has many customers, despite the fact that her store doesn’t have much variety of products. Maria is requesting a loan that will provide her with the necessary funds to buy a larger quantity of products. Her greatest wish is to be able to stock her business well so she can have more income. Maria is a mother who is very responsible and who wants to be able to provide all of the best for her family.

loans.use: to buy bread, milk, eggs, canned foods, bottled water, vegetables, and other products.

loans.name: Israel Antonio

texts.es: Israel de 35 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos  hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, frijol tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro, es muy conocido en la zona y ya tiene buena clientela pues obtiene las mejores cosechas, por lo tanto comercia producto de primera calidad y a precios muy accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable, Israel se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad, es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, piensa que aprovechar las oportunidades lo llevaran un paso más adelante del éxito; en la última siembra no obtuvo las ganancias esperadas y esta vez quiere aumentar la producción, pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plaga, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografía. Israel  tiene referencias de tener una moral intachable, responsable y de muy buena paga, confía que podrá responder a la deuda y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Israel, 35 years old, lives with his life companion and their two children. He works growing corn and beans. For many years he has worked in agriculture, he has had a lot of experience in it, he is very knowledgable about the area and has very good customers because he gets the best harvests due to his high quality product and accessible prices, what's more his service is unbeatable.

Israel is known for his great kindness, he is a very enterprising man with a great desire to get on in life. He intends to take advantage of the opportunities which will take him one step closer to success. 

His last crop did not bring the anticipated earnings, and this time he wants to increase production. For this he needs support from a loan. This is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will enable him to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest controls, herbicides, etc. and improve his plot of land which is shown in this photograph.

Israel is a person with irreproachable morals, responsible and very good at payments. He is confident he will be able to repay the loan and at the same time give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest controls, herbicides, etc. and improve his plot of land.

loans.name: Jose Eduardo

texts.es: Jose de 45 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maiz y frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de granos basicos que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive con su esposa y sus seis hijos, Jose esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos agricolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc. y mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografía  y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en: Jose is 45 years old and has been farming for a few years which has given him the necessary knowledge and ability to tend to his crops. His primary crops are corn and beans. He sells his crops to basic grain agencies that are near his home. With the earnings from his sales he helps with his family's expenses. He lives with his wife and six children. Jose is seeking a loan to be able to buy farming supplies that help him plant his crops such as manure, seeds, fertilizers, etc. to improve the soil, which is what he is showing in the photograph. In this way he will be able to have greater profits and continue helping with his household expenses without any barriers.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, fertilizer, etc. to improve the soil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, fertilizer, pest control, tools, etc. to improve the soil.

loans.name: Flor Cecilia

texts.es: Flor de 51 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica  a la venta de pan dulce vende en todos los cantones y caseríos que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, su producto lo anda en un pick up, posee mucha clientela ya que es un producto muy vendible, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunos gastos que se les presenta en su hogar, Flor está solicitando un crédito para la compra mas pan dulce por mayor para seguir con sus ventas ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Flor, 51 years old, lives in a relative's home with her husband and her daughter. She earns a living selling sweet bread in all of the cantons and small villages close to her place of residence. She transports her product in a pickup truck and has many customers since it is a very marketable product. 

With what she obtains from her work and with the help of her husband they are able to cover some of their household costs. Flor is requesting a loan to buy more sweet bread wholesale. This is to continue selling since that is her only source of work and to give her family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more sweet bread wholesale

loans.name: Jose  Orlando

texts.es: Jose de 47 años de edad desde hace muchos años que se dedica a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos, siembra maiz y frijol con lo que gana de sus cosechas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar. Vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar conformado  por  su esposa y sus hijos. El quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cosechas como abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, herbicidas, etc.  y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía pero dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingreso. Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y cancelar dicho crédito.
texts.en:
For many years, 47-year-old Jose has made a living in agriculture, which is his main source of income. He sows corn and bean seeds and with the money he earns from his crops he manages to afford some household expenses. He lives in his own home with his family, which consists of his wife and his children. 

He wants to buy the supplies needed for his crops such as manure, fertilizer, seeds, weed-killer, etc. to improve the land where he sows the seeds, which is what he is showing in the photo. Given that he does not have the necessary economic resources for such an investment, he has made the decision to seek a loan since this is the only way he can continue farming.

Like all farmers, he puts his trust in agriculture since he does not have another source of income. He hopes to get a plentiful crop that will allow him to continue supporting his household and repay the aforesaid loan.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, seeds, weed-killer, etc. to improve the land.

loans.name: Evelin Magdalena

texts.es:
Evelin Magdalena tiene 36 años de edad, madre soltera vive con sus dos hijos dependientes, en el distrito de Pucara, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de salchipollos, cuenta con un carrito salchipollero, el cual vende afuera de su domicilio todos los días, además la cliente vende marcianos, gelatinas y gaseosas, desde hace tres años.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de servicio descartables y mayor cantidad de pollo para sus preparos para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Evelin Magdalena is 36 years old, a single mother who lives with her two dependent children, in the Pucara district. The community has a hot climate, its population works in farming, business, and livestock. The district is located in Jaén province in the Cajamarca region of northern Peru.

She sells fried chicken. She has a cart, and she sells outside of her home every day. In addition she sells desserts and soda pop. She has had this business for three years.

Today she seeks a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 500 nuevos soles to buy disposable plates and silverware and a large quantity of chicken to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy disposable plates and silverware and a large quantity of chicken for her dishes.

loans.name: Alvina

texts.en:
Alvina is married and has two children who attend school. She lives in Merdzavan village with her family and parents-in-law. Alvina rents a small space in the center of the village and sells vegetables and fruits. She works day and night to be able to run her store in a sustainable way ensuring enough income for her family's living. 

Alvina requested a loan from SEF International for $1,000, which she will use to purchase vegetables and fruits to sell to her customers. She has taken a loan from local financial institutions before, but because of very difficult financial conditions, was not able to pay it back on time. Now, by ensuring that her retail business is successful and she is able to provide monthly payments for this loan, Alvina has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The second chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and fruits to sell

loans.name: Penda's Group

texts.fr:
Créer Le 07 Mai 2009, ce groupe est composé de femmes très actives dans l’agriculture de leur village, elles sont d’une solidarité sans faille. Elles se sont engagées dans le petit  commerce afin de réduire les obstacles à l’obtention des produits de consommation courante.

Madame Penda (assise à  droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est âgée de 41, est mariée, mère de 04 filles. C’est une femme très active et rigoureuse dans la gestion de ses activités génératrices de revenu. Elle compte plusieurs années d’expérience dans la vente de produits alimentaires tels que : le riz, le sucre et autres qu’elle achète en gros pour la revente au village.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle va acheter 10 sacs de riz à 11 000 F CFA, 05 sacs d’ognon à 11 500 F CFA, 03 sacs de sucre à 25 000 F CFA, des paquets de thé vert.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de renforcer son épargne d’une part et d’apporter son soutien à  son mari dans la prise en charge des soins des enfants.
texts.en: Created on May 7, 2009, this group is made up of women who are very active in agriculture in their village and who have been together in solidarity without problems. They got involved in small business in order to reduce the obstacles faced in obtaining everyday consumer products. Ms. Penda (seated to the right with her hand raised) is the star borrower of the group. She is 41 years old, married and the mother of 4 daughters. She is a very active and rigorous woman in the management of her revenue-generating businesses. She has several years of experience in the sale of food products such as: rice, sugar, and other items that she buys wholesale to resell in the village. With this new loan, she is going to buy 10 bags of rice for 11,000 francs CFA, 5 bags of onions for 11,500 francs CFA, 3 bags of sugar for 25,000 francs CFA, and some packages of green tea. The profits will permit her to strengthen her savings on one hand, and on the other to support her husband in taking care of the concerns of the children.

loans.use: to purchase 10 bags of rice for 11,000 francs CFA, 5 bags of onions for 11,500 francs CFA, 3 bags of sugar for 25,000 francs CFA, and some packages of green tea.

loans.name: Silvia Yanira

texts.es: Silvia de 37 años D. edad, habita con su familia en casa propia. Silvia es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un pequeño negocio en su hogar de residencia. El negocio consiste en una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para ella lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atiende con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchos en la zona y a demás porque siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan. Ella  sueña con dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Ella se motivo en solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño de darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Silvia is 37 years old and she lives in her own home with her family. Silvia is a hard-working and determined woman. A few years ago she decided to put a small business in her home. 

The business consists of a small store that, with great effort and dedication, has managed to survive throughout several years. She has many customers, because her customers are the most important thing to her and she always looks after them with a smile and a lot of hospitality. That is why she has earned the trust of many people in the area and furthermore because she always has what the customers are looking for. 

She dreams of giving her family a better quality of life. She motivated herself to request a loan from Apoyo Integral to be able to invest in her little store and stock it with all types of products such as: rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, candy, oil, paper, detergent and many more appealing items for her customers. She is confident that this way she will get to accomplish her dream of giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, candy, oil, paper, detergent and other products.

loans.name: Maa Bastrani 'b' Group

texts.en:
Jamuna, aged 41, is a self-motivated active woman entrepreneur of Duajhar village of Nuapada district of Odisha, India. She is a very hardworking lady. She is standing in the middle with a raised hand in the photo. She resides with her husband, two sons of fourteen and twelve years and a daughter of ten years old. 

Jamuna has been running a vegetable vending business of her own for the last eight years. Her husband is also running a cloth vending business. She manages all the activities, starting with purchasing vegetables from the nearest wholesale market ten kilometers away, to selling in her village. Every day in the early morning, she goes by bus to purchase vegetables, and after returning, manages her vegetable stall. 

Initially, Jamuna started this business with a small investment of her own. When Mahashakti Foundation started working in her village, she motivated four other women entrepreneurs, formed a group named Maa Bastrani ‘B’ and took a loan for development of her business. 

Between 2009 and 2013, Jamuna had already taken three loans of 18,000, 18,000 and 36,000 INR, and has given a new look to her business with increased income. She is very particular in repayment of loans. Now her income is 6,000 INR per month. For further development, she has taken the fourth loan of 40,000 INR in 2014. From this loan, she has purchased bulk vegetables, potatoes and onions. 

Jamuna hopes to construct a permanent cabin for her business and a good house for her family. 

The other members are PremKumari, who is doing handloom work, and Baidehi, Malati and Rohini, who are doing vegetable and fish businesses. All the members are happy and thankful to Mahashakti Foundation for the continuous support and present loan support from Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase bulk vegetables, potatoes, onions, etc.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo formado por 15 mujeres se llama Mujeres Unidas, está en su ciclo número once del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Las mismas son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras.
Reinalda es una mujer muy trabajadora que con lucha, esmero y por sobre todo esfuerzo, está saliendo adelante. Cuenta que todos los días trabaja desde muy tempranas horas, ya que se levanta a hacer sus comidas que ella misma luego sale a vender de manera ambulante. Su sueño es poder tener un copetín donde poder ir mejorando poco y crecer como microempresaria.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar verduras, carne, condimento, pollo, etc., con lo que podrá seguir preparando las comidas que sale a vender, y así poder ayudar a su familia con los ingresos que obtiene.
texts.en:
This group, which is made up of 15 women, is called Mujeres Unidas (United Women). The group is on its fifth loan cycle with Fundación Paraguaya's women's committee program, where they all work hard and help one another to get ahead. They are known in their area as very hard-working women. 

Reinalda is a very hard-working woman who with struggle and care is getting ahead in life. She says that she starts work very early each morning, since she wakes up to make the food that she then goes out to sell on foot. Her dream is to have a restaurant where she can gradually grow and improve as a micro-entrepreneur. 

She is requesting this loan to buy vegetables, meat, condiments, chicken, etc., so that she can continue to prepare food and help her family through the income she earns.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, condiments, chicken, etc.

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia, 49 years old, is married and has three children, one of whom is currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

For the past 2 years, Cynthia has operated a pig fattening business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional piglets, feed and others supplies for her business. Cynthia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, feed and others supplies for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies to help with coffee growing.

loans.name: Zozan

texts.en:
Zozan lives in the village of Taronik with her husband. They are farmers who run a small, but beautiful farm, which currently includes arable land where they cultivate cabbages, tomatoes, peppers and greens. Zozan and her husband work hard to gather each harvest. 

The requested loan of USD 3,000 will be a big support for Zozan to renovate the greenhouse and to purchase seeds and fertilizer. This hardworking woman will be very grateful to lenders for their support of her farming business, which she loves a lot.

As this is Zozan's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for renovations to the greenhouse, seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Andrea Sthefany

texts.es:
Andrea Sthefany es una joven estudiante de Administración Hoterlera, ella solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Andrea, tengo 19 años de edad, actualmente vivo en Villa Duarte, Santo Domingo Este,  tengo tres hermanos, mi padre falleció y mi madre es empleada pública. 
Actualmente estudio en la Universidad Nacional Pedro Henriquez Ureña (UNPHU), Lic. En Administración Hotelera, porque me quiero dedicar al área de la cocina, estoy cursando el segundo cuatrimestre y de las materias que he tomado mis favoritas son Turismo e inglés técnico de Hotelería.
He tenido que recurrir a este préstamo porque al morir mi padre quien era la persona que pagaba mis estudios ya no tengo forma de costearlos. De no conseguir este préstamo me voy a ver en la obligación de abandonarlos, ya que mi madre no va a poder seguir pagando por falta de recursos económicos. Espero de todo corazón la aprobación de mi solicitud porque de no ser así esto cambiaria mi vida drásticamente y no quisiera interrumpir mis estudios por esta situación.  Quisiera ver mis sueños hechos realidad para que mi padre desde donde este se sienta orgulloso de mi al verme graduada y trabajando
texts.en:
Andrea Sthefany is a young woman studying Hotel Administration who is requesting a loan to cover the cost of her education. This is her story: 

"My name is Andrea, I am 19 years old and currently live in Villa Duarte, Santo Domingo Este. I have three siblings, my father passed away and my mother is a public employee. 

"I'm currently studying at Universidad Nacional Pedro Henriquez Ureña (UNPHU) for a degree in Hotel Administration, because I want to work in cooking. I'm currently in my second quarter, and of the courses I've taken so far my favorites are Tourism and Technical Hotel English. I have to request this loan because I had no way to pay for my studies after my father died, since he was paying for them. If I don't receive this loan, I will be forced to abandon my studies, since my mother is unable to continue paying due to lack of economic resources. 

"I hope from the bottom of my heart that my loan request will be approved, because if it isn't it will drastically change my life and I don't want this situation to interrupt my studies. I want to see my dreams come true so that my father, wherever he may be, feels proud when he sees me graduate and start working."

loans.use: to pay for her higher education expenses

loans.name: La Nueva Semilla Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “La Nueva Semilla” y pertenecen a la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Leonarda vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco y es madre y padre para sus tres hijos, ella tiene 48 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de frutas como por ejemplo manzanas, plátanos, papayas, uvas, naranjas, piña y otros mas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al esfuerzo de su trabajo. Leonarada en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mas frutas. 

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de frutas, venta de terrenos, venta de cuyes, venta de trajes típicos de la región, elaboración de planos de casas y venta de chocolateria. 

Los socios agradecen a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The group members belong to Asociación Arariwa's "La Nueva Semilla" ("The New Seed") village bank in the city of Cusco. Leonarda lives in the beautiful city of Cusco and serves as both mother and father for her three children. She is 48 years old and works selling fruit, such as apples, bananas, papayas, grapes, oranges and pineapples, among others. She has been in this business for a number of years, and does quite well thanks to her hard work. Leonarda is requesting a loan to buy more fruit. 

The other group members work selling fruit, land, guinea pigs, traditional local clothing, chocolate, and drafting house plans. 

The group members are grateful to those who are supporting this dream and are committed to make all of their payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: to buy more fruit

loans.name: Jimmy Junior

texts.es:
Jimmy Junior tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijo, en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de frutales, arroz y café, comercio de los mismos, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público, por medio de una mototaxi, hace un promedio de hace 6 años, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para realizar mantenimiento en su mototaxi y de esta manera brindar un servicio más seguro a sus pasajeros.
texts.en:
Jimmy Junior is 30 years old. He lives with his wife and son in the district of Pucará, a community with warm weather. 

It is a community of farmers. They grow and sell fruits, rice and coffee.  It is located in the Jaén Province which is a part of the Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru. 
 
For the past six years, he has provided a public transportation service via a rickshaw. 

He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,500 PEN [$550] to perform maintenance on his rickshaw and in this way provide his customers with a safer service.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his rickshaw

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia is married and she works hard to support her family. For the past 5 years, she has operated a ready-to-wear clothing business in the Philippines.

Cynthia has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of ready-to-wear clothing to sell. In the future, Cynthia would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of ready-to-wear clothing to sell

loans.name: Elnora

texts.en:
Elnora is 48 years old and married with five children. With three children currently in school, Elnora works very hard to provide for them.

Elnora runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell in her general store.

Elnora has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, cereals, coffee, sugar, canned goods, noodles, etc.

In the future, Elnora would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Heyris Yassiel

texts.es:
Heyris Yassiel es una estudiante de Medicina, ella solicita un préstamos para poder cubrir sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia:Mi nombre es Heyris Yassiel, tengo 18 años de edad y  Vivo en Los Trinitarios II, Santo Domingo Este. Soy la más grande de tres hermanos que actualmente vivimos bajo la tutoría de mis padres, de los cuales mi madre es la única que actualmente percibe ingresos. Estudié el bachillerato en el liceo público (Gratuito)
Quiero estudiar Medicina en la Universidad UTESA, pero el poco dinero que percibe mi hogar para una familia de 5 miembros no me permite ser lo que siempre he querido desde pequeña que es ser médico y por eso me he visto en la necesidad de solicitar una ayuda financiera que me pueda ayudar a cumplir mi sueño de ser doctora.
Sin este préstamo se me haría imposible estudiar y echar para adelante como persona, por ende este me cambiaria mi vida de una forma maravillosa porque me ayudaría a estudiar lo que me gusta, poder llegar a ser una Doctora en el mañana y a cumplir mis metas académicas que son poder sacar buenas calificaciones, mi familia se sentiría muy orgullosas de mí.
Quiero que me ayuden hacer esta carrera porque quiero en un futuro poder salvar vidas y ayudar a darle una mejor salud a los de mi sociedad.
texts.en:
Heyris Yassiel is a medical student who is requesting a loan to pay for her education-related expenses. This is her story:

"My name is Heyris Yassiel, I am 18 years old and live in Los Trinitarios II, Santo Domingo Este. I am the oldest of three siblings, and we all currently live with our parents. Only my mother is currently earning income. I went to a free public high school.

"I want to study Medicine at the Universidad UTESA, but the little income my family earns will not allow me to be what I've always wanted to be since I was young: a doctor. This is why I need to request financial aid that will help me achieve my dream of being a doctor. 

"Without this loan, it would be impossible for me to study and get ahead as a person. This will change my life in a marvelous way, because it will help me study what I like, become a doctor in the future and meet my academic goals, which are to get good grades. My family would be very proud of me. 

"I want you to help me get my degree because in the future I want to save lives and help improve the health of those in my society."

loans.use: to pay for higher education

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth De Los Angeles

texts.es: María tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus cuatro hijos de 17 años, 15 años, 8 años y 7 años de edad. María se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva de forma ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo y de esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar y da a su familia lo necesario. María desea reparar el techo de su vivienda puesto que se encuentra en mal estado y desea dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones. María solicita este crédito a FUSAI para proceder a la compra de los materiales necesarios como lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de la vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
María is 34 years old and lives in her own home with her four children who are 17,15,8 and 7 years old. 

For a long time María has been selling clothes door to door. This is how she takes care of her home and gives her family what they need. 

María wants to fix the roof in her house which is in bad shape and she wants to give her children better living conditions. 

María is asking for this FUSAI loan in order to buy the necessary materials such as galvanized steel, wood and nails to change the roof of her house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized steel, wood and nails to change the roof of her house.

loans.name: Jose Simon

texts.es: Jose de 54 años de edad dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace varios años. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. Vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus hijos. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para comprar los principales insumos agrícolas: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc. y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Jose is 54 years old and has dedicated himself to growing corn and beans for many years. This is how he earns a living and is able to bring home the daily bread. He farms year after year and is a very hardworking, honorable and responsible man. He lives in a house he owns with his wife and their children. 

He has made the decision to ask for a loan to buy primary agricultural supplies: fertilizers, insecticides, seeds, etc. and to improve the land where he plants, which is shown in the photograph. He hopes to have favorable results, as he doesn't have another source of income.

He trusts in God that he will be able to obtain an abundant harvest, which will allow him to keep bringing home the daily bread.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, seeds, etc. and to improve the land

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Emilio tiene 36 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su hija en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales como cuyes y cerdos desde hace 03 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de cerdos menores para posteriormente engordarlos y ofrecerlos a un mejor precio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Emilio is 36 years old. He lives in his own house with his daughter in the district of Cayaltí, a community whose population works in agriculture, trade, and ranching. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the region of Lambayeque on the north coast of Peru.

Emilio has made a living by raising and selling animals, such as guinea pigs and pigs, for three years. His business is located at the back of his home. He has requested a loan of 1,000 PEN in order to purchase young pigs, fatten them up, and offer them to his clients at a greater price.

loans.use: to buy young pigs, fatten them up, and sell them at a greater price

loans.name: Elenita

texts.en: Elenita, 33 years old, is married and has four children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For the past 13 years, Elenita has operated a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her store. In the future, Elenita would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell

loans.name: Emilia

texts.en:
Emilia is 51 years old and married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Emilia has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 27,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more groceries like canned goods, sugar, milk, shampoo, fabric conditioner, candies, etc. to sell.

Emilia has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like canned goods, sugar, milk, shampoo, fabric conditioner, candies, etc. to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more used shoes for her business.

loans.name: Kulinoli Din Viela - Tampion Group

texts.en:
Fati is a 48-year-old married woman living with her husband and 4 children in a community called Tampion in Northern Ghana. Fati belongs to the Kulinoli din viela Women Association. This group has been operating a business extracting shea butter from shea nuts for the past 4 years. Fati processes high premium shea butter, some of which is sold to aggregates and exported to the European market, while the rest is sold and consumed in Ghana.

Fati has requested a loan of 8,200 GHS to buy 80 bags of shea nuts and to pay for fuel used in shea butter extraction. Fati hopes to earn more money to support her children's upbringing and to repay this loan well.

loans.use: to buy 80 bags of shea nuts and to pay for fuel used in shea butter extraction

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more oil for her business.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
José tiene 52 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de la Matanza, es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio cuenta con servicios básicos como son agua y luz, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se desempeña como maestro de construcción civil, junto a su esposa también venden maíz amarillo, son una familia unida que se esfuerza, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de herramientas de trabajo que le permitan desarrollarse de una mejor manera.
texts.en:
José is 52 years old, lives with his wife and children in the Matanza district, a place where the inhabitants work in farming, cattle-raising and trade. They have basic services such as water and electricity, located in Morropon Province which is part of the Piura region on the north coast of Peru.

He works as a master of civil construction. Together with his wife, he also sells yellow corn. They are a united family which strives, they have requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 3,000 nuevos soles to buy a set of work tools which will help him to work better.

loans.use: to buy a set of work tools that will enable him to work in a better way.

loans.name: Jose Orlando

texts.es:
José Orlando tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público, cuenta con una mototaxi que transporta a sus pasajeros por zonas aledañas a su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de repuestos para el mantenimiento de su vehículo y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
José Orlando is 40 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of Pucará, a community that makes its living through farming, trade and livestock in the province of Jaén. It is part of the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru. 

He provides a public transportation service with his rickshaw. 

He drives his passengers to neighboring areas. 

He has requested a 2,000 PEN [$725] loan to buy replacement parts to maintain his vehicle and in this way generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Carlos Miguel

texts.es:
Carlos Miguel tiene 25 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público en una mototaxi, traslada a sus pasajeros a zonas aledañas a su distrito, también se desempeña como jornalero agrícola prestando servicios a sus vecinos, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de (llantas, soat, arrastre y otros.) y de esta manera brindar un servicio seguro a sus pasajeros.
texts.en: Carlos Miguel is 25 years old and lives with his wife and children in Cayaltí district, a community whose people work in farming, business, and livestock. It is located in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, in northern Peru. He provides public transportation services in a motortaxi, transporting people to neighborhood zones in his area. He also works as a day laborer in agriculture, working for his neighbors. He asked for a loan for 1000 nuevos soles to buy parts (tires, seat belts, tow hitch and other parts) and in this way provide safe service for his passengers.

loans.use: to buy tires, seat belt, tow hitch and other parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en: Evangeline is married and she works hard to support her family. For the past 4 years, she has operated a general store business in the Philippines. Evangeline has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more goods to sell in her general store. She successfully repaid her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business. Evangeline would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy more goods to sell in her general store

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn, 47 years old, is married and has five children, two currently in school. Evelyn works very hard to provide for them.

For the past 2 years, Evelyn has run a general store in the Philippines, selling a variety of items such as eggs, cereals, chocolate drink, sugar, detergent, soap, shampoo, etc. She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more of these items to sell. In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items, such as eggs, cereals, chocolate drink, sugar, detergent, soap, shampoo, etc. to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more lappa (fabric) and blouses for her business.

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru:
Шахноза трудолюбивая и ответственная женщина. Она разведена с мужем и имеет на иждевении детей. Шахноза живёт в маленьком посёлке. Она очень любит своих детей и старается дать им всё необходимое для того, чтобы они могли расти, развиваться и реализовывать себя в обществе. Для этого Шахноза занимается своим бизнесом, чтобы иметь постоянный доход.

Она закупает и продаёт детскую одежду и обувь. Закупает она свой товар на большом оптовом рынке и продаёт на местном рынке своего посёлка. Для этого у неё имеется собственная лавка. Сейчас Шахноза желает расширить ассортимент своего товара, ей необходимо закупить побольше весенней и летней одежды, так как начинается  тёплый сезон. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и желает получить кредит на покупку одежды. Шахноза очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Shahnoza is a hardworking and responsible woman. She is divorced from her husband and has children who depend on her. Shahnoza lives in a small village. She loves her children very much and strives to give them everything necessary so that they can grow, develop and realize themselves. To do this, Shahnoza has her own business, in order to have a permanent income. She purchases and sells children's clothing and shoes. She purchases her goods at a large wholesale market and sells them at the local market in her village. She has her own sales stall. 

Currently Shahnoza wants to expand the assortment of goods. She needs to purchase more spring and summer clothing, as the warm season is starting. Therefore she turned to Arvand and would like to get a loan to purchase clothing. Shahnoza hopes very much for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy clothing for the spring and summer season

loans.name: Usuf

texts.en: This is 31 year-old Usuf.  He is married and has two children aged 13 and 14 years old. In 2009, Usuf established his bike riding business. He began his business because that was his field. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about SLL 1,000,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 4,000,000. Usuf requires a loan in order to buy more bikes to loan. In the future, Usuf plans to open a bike center for bike loaning. He is very hardworking.  He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more bikes to loan.

loans.name: Fabiola

texts.es:
Fabiola tiene 36 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad de clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral (cuyes, patos, gallinas), ubicada en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 200 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de animales para engordarlos y ofrecerlo en el mercado de su distrito.
texts.en:
Fabiola is 36 years old and lives with her husband and children in Oyotún district, where there is a variable climate and people who work in farming, business, and livestock. It is located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

She raises and sells small animals (guinea pigs, ducks, chickens) and keeps them behind her home. She seeks a loan for 1200 nuevos soles to buy a large quantity of animals to fatten and sell in her district's market.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of animals to fatten and sell.

loans.name: Qosimjon

texts.ru:
Косимчон работает инструктором по вождению и ремонту автомобилей. Данной деятельностью он занимается в течение 10 лет. Косимчон является опытным авто-инструктором, который может помочь преодолеть негативное психологическое состояние, затрудняющий освоению основ вождения у новичков. За эти годы Косимчон разработал собственную методику преподавания, позволяющий проще воспринимать учебную информацию. Сейчас он хочет расширить свою деятельность. Косимчон просит кредит, чтобы приобрести автозапчасти для проведения практических занятий по ремонту автомобиля. Он нуждается в кредите, так как не имеет на руках большой суммы, а автозапчасти стоят дорого.
Косимчон живет с женой и ребенком в районе Б.Гафурова города Худжанд, ему 35 лет. Его жена домохозяйка, а ребенок учится в школе. Косимчон всегда ответственно относится к благосостоянию семьи, ведь он единственный добытчик в семье и заработок, который он получает единственный источник дохода семьи. Поэтому ему важна Ваша поддержка.
texts.en:
Qosimjon works as an instructor in driving and repairing cars. He has worked with this activity for a period of 10 years. Qosimjon is an experienced vehicle instructor, who help people overcome a negative psychological state, hampering the development of driving basics for beginners. Over the years, Qosimjon has developed his own teaching methods, that make it easier to understand the instructional information. 

Currently, Qosimjon wouldl ike to expand his business. He requests a loan in order to purchase vehicle parts to hold practical trainings on vehicle repair. He needs this loan as he does not have a large amount on his hands, and vehicle spare parts are expensive. 

Qosimjon lives with his wife and childre in the region of B. Gafurov, in the city of Khujand. He is 35 years old. His wife is a housewife, and the children go to school. Qosimjon always has a reponsible attitude towards the welfare of his family, as he is the only wage-earner in the family. The income he receives is the family's only income. Therefore your support is very important to him.

loans.use: to purchase vehicle parts to hold practical training in vehicle repair

loans.name: Aurora

texts.es:
Aurora tiene 46 años de edad, vive en casa familiar de material noble junto a su esposo y 2 hijos en el Distrito de Santo Domingo De La Capilla, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de comida y golosinas desde hace 3 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 800 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de golosinas para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Aurora is 46 years old, she lives in the family home of quality material with her husband and 2 children in the Santo Domingo De La Capilla district, a community which works in farming, trade and cattle-raising, located in the Cutervo Province, which is part of the Cajamarca Region, in the northern highlands of Peru.

She has worked selling food and sweets for three years. Her business is located at the rear of her home. She has requested a loan of 800 nuevos soles to buy a bigger quantity of sweets to offer her customers and in this way make better income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a bigger quantity of sweets to offer her customers.

location.town: Santo Domingo de la Capilla - Cutervo - Cajamarca

loans.name: Maria Rosaura

texts.es: María tiene 59 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad y colaboran con la economía del hogar. Desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica al comercio de variedad de productos como son las famosas hojas de huerta usadas para hacer los ricos tamales típicos de carne de pillo o de frijoles, así como; naranjas, guineos, plátanos y ayotes. Es una mujer con espíritu emprendedor quien con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado sacar a su familia adelante. María solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro de retención y para reparar el techo de la vivida  el cual se encuentra en mal estado. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera, arena, cemento, ladrillo y hierro. Espera poder contar con este apoyo para mejorar las condiciones de su familia.
texts.en:
María is 59 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their three children who are older and contribute to the household economy. 

For a long time she has sold a variety of products such as the famous vegetable leaves used to make delicious typical tamales of meat or beans as well as oranges, bananas, plantains and pumpkins. 

She is a woman with an entrepreneurial spirit who with a lot of effort has been able to get her family ahead. 

María  is requesting this FUSAI loan to invest in building a retention wall and to fix the roof of the house which is in bad shape.
 
With the requested loan amount she will buy galvanized steel, wood, sand, cement, brick and iron. 

She hopes to be able to count on this support to to improve the conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy galvanized steel, wood, sand, cement, brick and iron to fix the roof in the house and to build a retention wall.

loans.name: Girasol Group

texts.es: María Yulissa (ella aparece en la foto en la fila de atrás, esta de último de izquierda a derecha) es una persona de 26 años de edad, vive con su familia en el municipio de Santo Domingo, departamento de Suchitepéquez, tiene dos hijos: la primera tiene 7 años de edad, estudia primero primaria, el segundo tiene 4 años todavía no asiste a la escuela, es una persona muy emprendedora, se dedica a vender comida (churrascos) por las tardes a los trabajadores de las fincas, ella vio una oportunidad de poder generar algún ingreso y con las ganancia ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la familia, María Yulissa solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos y utensilios para la preparación de comida (churrascos), los sueños de ella es ayudar a sus hijos para que tenga una profesión ya que ella no tuvo oportunidad de estudiar.
texts.en:
María Yulissa (she appears in the photo in the back row, she is the last one on the right) is 26 years old and lives with her family in the municipality of Santo Domingo, department of Suchitepéquez. 

She has two children. the first is 7 years old and is in the first grade. The second one is four years old and is still not in school. 

She is a very entrepreneurial person. She sells food (steaks) in the afternoons to the farm workers. 

She saw an opportunity to generate some income and with the profits help her husband with the household expenses. 

María Yulissa is requesting a loan to buy supplies and equipment for making food (steaks). 

Her dreams are to help her children so that they become professionals since she did not have the opportunity to study.

loans.use: to buy supplies and equipment for making food (steaks).

loans.name: Rosa Angelica

texts.es:
Rosa Angelica tiene 21 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Morropon una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería,, ubicada en la Provincia de del mismo nombre que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de comida, bebidas gaseosas y chichas, también se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (pavos y patos) en a parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de un carrito que le permita vender salchipapas y de esta manera facilitara sus ventas, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Angelica is 21 years old and lives with her husband and children in the district of Morropon. It has a hot climate, and the local people mostly earn their living from agriculture, livestock, and trade. It is located in Morropon province, part of the Piura region, on the north coast of Peru.

Rosa Angelica works selling food, carbonated drinks, and chichas (drinks made from maize). She also rears and sells turkeys and ducks in her back yard. She is seeking a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles in order to buy a vending cart. This will allow her to sell salchipapas (a popular fast food dish made up of sausages and French fries), and so make it easier for her to improve her sales and generate a better income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a vending cart to sell sausages and French fries.
